2776 /* Initialize the port and create corresponding host interface */
2777 if (initializePort(p))
2778 {
2779 /* Create associated Gearbox lane mapping */
2780 initGearboxPort(p);
2781
2782 /* Add port to port list */
2783 m_portList[alias] = p;
2784 saiOidToAlias[id] = alias;
2785 m_port_ref_count[alias] = 0;
2786 m_portOidToIndex[id] = index;
2787
2788 /* Add port name map to counter table */
2789 FieldValueTuple tuple(p.m_alias, sai_serialize_object_id(p.m_port_id));
2790 vector<FieldValueTuple> fields;
2791 fields.push_back(tuple);
2792 m_counterTable->set("", fields);
2793
2794 // Install a flex counter for this port to track stats
2795 auto flex_counters_orch = gDirectory.get<FlexCounterOrch*>();
2796 /* Delay installing the counters if they are yet enabled
2797 If they are enabled, install the counters immediately */
2798 if (flex_counters_orch->getPortCountersState())
2799 {
2800 auto port_counter_stats = generateCounterStats(PORT_STAT_COUNTER_FLEX_COUNTER_GROUP);
2801 port_stat_manager.setCounterIdList(p.m_port_id,
2802 CounterType::PORT, port_counter_stats);
2803 auto gbport_counter_stats = generateCounterStats(PORT_STAT_COUNTER_FLEX_COUNTER_GROUP, true);
2804 if (p.m_system_side_id)
2805 gb_port_stat_manager.setCounterIdList(p.m_system_side_id,
2806 CounterType::PORT, gbport_counter_stats);
2807 if (p.m_line_side_id)
2808 gb_port_stat_manager.setCounterIdList(p.m_line_side_id,
2809 CounterType::PORT, gbport_counter_stats);
2810 }
2811 if (flex_counters_orch->getPortBufferDropCountersState())
2812 {
2813 auto port_buffer_drop_stats = generateCounterStats(PORT_BUFFER_DROP_STAT_FLEX_COUNTER_GROUP);
2814 port_buffer_drop_stat_manager.setCounterIdList(p.m_port_id, CounterType::PORT, port_buffer_drop_stats);
2815 }
2816
2817 PortUpdate update = { p, true };
2818 notify(SUBJECT_TYPE_PORT_CHANGE, static_cast<void *>(&update));
2819
2820 m_portList[alias].m_init = true;
2821
2822 if (role == "Rec" || role == "Inb")
2823 {
2824 m_recircPortRole[alias] = role;
2825 }
2826
2827 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Initialized port %s", alias.c_str());
2828 }
2829 else
2830 {
2831 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to initialize port %s", alias.c_str());
2832 return false;
2833 }
2834 }
2835 }
2836 else
2837 {
2838 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to locate port lane combination alias:%s", alias.c_str());
2839 return false;
2840 }
2841
2842 return true;
2843}
2844
2845void PortsOrch::deInitPort(string alias, sai_object_id_t port_id)
2846{
2847 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
2848
2849 Port p;
2850
2851 if (!getPort(port_id, p))
2852 {
2853 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get port object for port id 0x%" PRIx64, port_id);
2854 return;
2855 }
2856
2857 /* remove port from flex_counter_table for updating counters */
2858 auto flex_counters_orch = gDirectory.get<FlexCounterOrch*>();
2859 if ((flex_counters_orch->getPortCountersState()))
2860 {
2861 port_stat_manager.clearCounterIdList(p.m_port_id);
2862 }
2863
2864 if (flex_counters_orch->getPortBufferDropCountersState())
2865 {
2866 port_buffer_drop_stat_manager.clearCounterIdList(p.m_port_id);
2867 }
2868
2869 /* remove port name map from counter table */
2870 m_counterTable->hdel("", alias);
2871
2872 /* Remove the associated port serdes attribute */
2873 removePortSerdesAttribute(p.m_port_id);
2874
2875 m_portList[alias].m_init = false;
2876 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("De-Initialized port %s", alias.c_str());
2877}
2878
2879bool PortsOrch::bake()
2880{
2881 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
2882
2883 // Check the APP_DB port table for warm reboot
2884 vector<FieldValueTuple> tuples;
2885 string value;
2886 bool foundPortConfigDone = m_portTable->hget("PortConfigDone", "count", value);
2887 uintmax_t portCount;
2888 char* endPtr = NULL;
2889 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("foundPortConfigDone = %d", foundPortConfigDone);
2890
2891 bool foundPortInitDone = m_portTable->get("PortInitDone", tuples);
2892 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("foundPortInitDone = %d", foundPortInitDone);
2893
2894 vector<string> keys;
2895 m_portTable->getKeys(keys);
2896 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("m_portTable->getKeys %zd", keys.size());
2897
2898 if (!foundPortConfigDone || !foundPortInitDone)
2899 {
2900 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("No port table, fallback to cold start");
2901 cleanPortTable(keys);
2902 return false;
2903 }
2904
2905 portCount = strtoumax(value.c_str(), &endPtr, 0);
2906 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("portCount = %" PRIuMAX ", m_portCount = %u", portCount, m_portCount);
2907 if (portCount != keys.size() - 2)
2908 {
2909 // Invalid port table
2910 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Invalid port table: portCount, expecting %" PRIuMAX ", got %zu",
2911 portCount, keys.size() - 2);
2912
2913 cleanPortTable(keys);
2914 return false;
2915 }
2916
2917 for (const auto& alias: keys)
2918 {
2919 if (alias == "PortConfigDone" || alias == "PortInitDone")
2920 {
2921 continue;
2922 }
2923
2924 m_pendingPortSet.emplace(alias);
2925 }
2926
2927 addExistingData(m_portTable.get());
2928 addExistingData(APP_LAG_TABLE_NAME);
2929 addExistingData(APP_LAG_MEMBER_TABLE_NAME);
2930 addExistingData(APP_VLAN_TABLE_NAME);
2931 addExistingData(APP_VLAN_MEMBER_TABLE_NAME);
2932
2933 return true;
2934}
2935
2936// Clean up port table
2937void PortsOrch::cleanPortTable(const vector<string>& keys)
2938{
2939 for (auto& key : keys)
2940 {
2941 m_portTable->del(key);
2942 }
2943}
2944
2945void PortsOrch::removePortFromLanesMap(string alias)
2946{
2947
2948 for (auto it = m_lanesAliasSpeedMap.begin(); it != m_lanesAliasSpeedMap.end(); it++)
2949 {
2950 if (get<0>(it->second) == alias)
2951 {
2952 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Removing port %s from lanes map", alias.c_str());
2953 it = m_lanesAliasSpeedMap.erase(it);
2954 break;
2955 }
2956 }
2957}
2958
2959void PortsOrch::removePortFromPortListMap(sai_object_id_t port_id)
2960{
2961
2962 for (auto it = m_portListLaneMap.begin(); it != m_portListLaneMap.end(); it++)
2963 {
2964 if (it->second == port_id)
2965 {
2966 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Removing port-id %" PRIx64 " from port list map", port_id);
2967 it = m_portListLaneMap.erase(it);
2968 break;
2969 }
2970 }
2971}
2972
2973
2974void PortsOrch::doPortTask(Consumer &consumer)
2975{
2976 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
2977
2978 auto it = consumer.m_toSync.begin();
2979 while (it != consumer.m_toSync.end())
2980 {
2981 auto &t = it->second;
2982
2983 string alias = kfvKey(t);
2984 string op = kfvOp(t);
2985
2986 if (alias == "PortConfigDone")
2987 {
2988 if (m_portConfigState != PORT_CONFIG_MISSING)
2989 {
2990 // Already received, ignore this task
2991 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
2992 continue;
2993 }
2994
2995 m_portConfigState = PORT_CONFIG_RECEIVED;
2996
2997 for (auto i : kfvFieldsValues(t))
2998 {
2999 if (fvField(i) == "count")
3000 {
3001 m_portCount = to_uint<uint32_t>(fvValue(i));
3002 }
3003 }
3004 }
3005
3006 /* Get notification from application */
3007 /* portsyncd application:
3008 * When portsorch receives 'PortInitDone' message, it indicates port initialization
3009 * procedure is done. Before port initialization procedure, none of other tasks
3010 * are executed.
3011 */
3012 if (alias == "PortInitDone")
3013 {
3014 /* portsyncd restarting case:
3015 * When portsyncd restarts, duplicate notifications may be received.
3016 */
3017 if (!m_initDone)
3018 {
3019 addSystemPorts();
3020 m_initDone = true;
3021 SWSS_LOG_INFO("Get PortInitDone notification from portsyncd.");
3022 }
3023
3024 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3025 return;
3026
3027 }
3028
3029 if (op == SET_COMMAND)
3030 {
3031 set<int> lane_set;
3032 vector<uint32_t> attr_val;
3033 map<sai_port_serdes_attr_t, vector<uint32_t>> serdes_attr;
3034 typedef pair<sai_port_serdes_attr_t, vector<uint32_t>> serdes_attr_pair;
3035 string admin_status;
3036 string fec_mode;
3037 string pfc_asym;
3038 uint32_t mtu = 0;
3039 uint32_t speed = 0;
3040 string learn_mode;
3041 string an_str;
3042 string lt_str;
3043 int an = -1;
3044 int lt = -1;
3045 int index = -1;
3046 string role;
3047 string adv_speeds_str;
3048 string interface_type_str;
3049 string adv_interface_types_str;
3050 vector<uint32_t> adv_speeds;
3051 sai_port_interface_type_t interface_type;
3052 vector<uint32_t> adv_interface_types;
3053 string tpid_string;
3054 uint16_t tpid = 0;
3055
3056 for (auto i : kfvFieldsValues(t))
3057 {
3058 attr_val.clear();
3059 /* Set interface index */
3060 if (fvField(i) == "index")
3061 {
3062 index = (int)stoul(fvValue(i));
3063 }
3064 /* Get lane information of a physical port and initialize the port */
3065 else if (fvField(i) == "lanes")
3066 {
3067 string lane_str;
3068 istringstream iss(fvValue(i));
3069
3070 while (getline(iss, lane_str, ','))
3071 {
3072 int lane = stoi(lane_str);
3073 lane_set.insert(lane);
3074 }
3075 }
3076 /* Set port admin status */
3077 else if (fvField(i) == "admin_status")
3078 {
3079 admin_status = fvValue(i);
3080 }
3081 /* Set port MTU */
3082 else if (fvField(i) == "mtu")
3083 {
3084 mtu = (uint32_t)stoul(fvValue(i));
3085 }
3086 /* Set port TPID */
3087 if (fvField(i) == "tpid")
3088 {
3089 tpid_string = fvValue(i);
3090 // Need to get rid of the leading 0x
3091 tpid_string.erase(0,2);
3092 tpid = (uint16_t)stoi(tpid_string, 0, 16);
3093 SWSS_LOG_DEBUG("Handling TPID to 0x%x, string value:%s", tpid, tpid_string.c_str());
3094 }
3095 /* Set port speed */
3096 else if (fvField(i) == "speed")
3097 {
3098 speed = (uint32_t)stoul(fvValue(i));
3099 }
3100 /* Set port fec */
3101 else if (fvField(i) == "fec")
3102 {
3103 fec_mode = fvValue(i);
3104 }
3105 /* Get port fdb learn mode*/
3106 else if (fvField(i) == "learn_mode")
3107 {
3108 learn_mode = fvValue(i);
3109 }
3110 /* Set port asymmetric PFC */
3111 else if (fvField(i) == "pfc_asym")
3112 {
3113 pfc_asym = fvValue(i);
3114 }
3115 /* Set autoneg and ignore the port speed setting */
3116 else if (fvField(i) == "autoneg")
3117 {
3118 an_str = fvValue(i);
3119 }
3120 /* Set advertised speeds */
3121 else if (fvField(i) == "adv_speeds")
3122 {
3123 adv_speeds_str = fvValue(i);
3124 }
3125 /* Set interface type */
3126 else if (fvField(i) == "interface_type")
3127 {
3128 interface_type_str = fvValue(i);
3129 }
3130 /* Set advertised interface type */
3131 else if (fvField(i) == "adv_interface_types")
3132 {
3133 adv_interface_types_str = fvValue(i);
3134 }
3135 /* Set link training */
3136 else if (fvField(i) == "link_training")
3137 {
3138 lt_str = fvValue(i);
3139 }
3140 /* Set port serdes Pre-emphasis */
3141 else if (fvField(i) == "preemphasis")
3142 {
3143 getPortSerdesVal(fvValue(i), attr_val);
3144 serdes_attr.insert(serdes_attr_pair(SAI_PORT_SERDES_ATTR_PREEMPHASIS, attr_val));
3145 }
3146 /* Set port serdes idriver */
3147 else if (fvField(i) == "idriver")
3148 {
3149 getPortSerdesVal(fvValue(i), attr_val);
3150 serdes_attr.insert(serdes_attr_pair(SAI_PORT_SERDES_ATTR_IDRIVER, attr_val));
3151 }
3152 /* Set port serdes ipredriver */
3153 else if (fvField(i) == "ipredriver")
3154 {
3155 getPortSerdesVal(fvValue(i), attr_val);
3156 serdes_attr.insert(serdes_attr_pair(SAI_PORT_SERDES_ATTR_IPREDRIVER, attr_val));
3157 }
3158 /* Set port serdes pre1 */
3159 else if (fvField(i) == "pre1")
3160 {
3161 getPortSerdesVal(fvValue(i), attr_val);
3162 serdes_attr.insert(serdes_attr_pair(SAI_PORT_SERDES_ATTR_TX_FIR_PRE1, attr_val));
3163 }
3164 /* Set port serdes pre2 */
3165 else if (fvField(i) == "pre2")
3166 {
3167 getPortSerdesVal(fvValue(i), attr_val);
3168 serdes_attr.insert(serdes_attr_pair(SAI_PORT_SERDES_ATTR_TX_FIR_PRE2, attr_val));
3169 }
3170 /* Set port serdes pre3 */
3171 else if (fvField(i) == "pre3")
3172 {
3173 getPortSerdesVal(fvValue(i), attr_val);
3174 serdes_attr.insert(serdes_attr_pair(SAI_PORT_SERDES_ATTR_TX_FIR_PRE3, attr_val));
3175 }
3176 /* Set port serdes main */
3177 else if (fvField(i) == "main")
3178 {
3179 getPortSerdesVal(fvValue(i), attr_val);
3180 serdes_attr.insert(serdes_attr_pair(SAI_PORT_SERDES_ATTR_TX_FIR_MAIN, attr_val));
3181 }
3182 /* Set port serdes post1 */
3183 else if (fvField(i) == "post1")
3184 {
3185 getPortSerdesVal(fvValue(i), attr_val);
3186 serdes_attr.insert(serdes_attr_pair(SAI_PORT_SERDES_ATTR_TX_FIR_POST1, attr_val));
3187 }
3188 /* Set port serdes post2 */
3189 else if (fvField(i) == "post2")
3190 {
3191 getPortSerdesVal(fvValue(i), attr_val);
3192 serdes_attr.insert(serdes_attr_pair(SAI_PORT_SERDES_ATTR_TX_FIR_POST2, attr_val));
3193 }
3194 /* Set port serdes post3 */
3195 else if (fvField(i) == "post3")
3196 {
3197 getPortSerdesVal(fvValue(i), attr_val);
3198 serdes_attr.insert(serdes_attr_pair(SAI_PORT_SERDES_ATTR_TX_FIR_POST3, attr_val));
3199 }
3200 /* Set port serdes attn */
3201 else if (fvField(i) == "attn")
3202 {
3203 getPortSerdesVal(fvValue(i), attr_val);
3204 serdes_attr.insert(serdes_attr_pair(SAI_PORT_SERDES_ATTR_TX_FIR_ATTN, attr_val));
3205 }
3206
3207 /* Get port role */
3208 if (fvField(i) == "role")
3209 {
3210 role = fvValue(i);
3211 }
3212 }
3213
3214 /* Collect information about all received ports */
3215 if (lane_set.size())
3216 {
3217 m_lanesAliasSpeedMap[lane_set] = make_tuple(alias, speed, an, fec_mode, index, role);
3218 }
3219
3220 // TODO:
3221 // Fix the issue below
3222 // After PortConfigDone, while waiting for "PortInitDone" and the first gBufferOrch->isPortReady(alias),
3223 // the complete m_lanesAliasSpeedMap may be populated again, so initPort() will be called more than once
3224 // for the same port.
3225
3226 /* Once all ports received, go through the each port and perform appropriate actions:
3227 * 1. Remove ports which don't exist anymore
3228 * 2. Create new ports
3229 * 3. Initialize all ports
3230 */
3231 if (m_portConfigState == PORT_CONFIG_RECEIVED || m_portConfigState == PORT_CONFIG_DONE)
3232 {
3233 for (auto it = m_portListLaneMap.begin(); it != m_portListLaneMap.end();)
3234 {
3235 if (m_lanesAliasSpeedMap.find(it->first) == m_lanesAliasSpeedMap.end())
3236 {
3237 if (SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS != removePort(it->second))
3238 {
3239 throw runtime_error("PortsOrch initialization failure.");
3240 }
3241 it = m_portListLaneMap.erase(it);
3242 }
3243 else
3244 {
3245 it++;
3246 }
3247 }
3248
3249 for (auto it = m_lanesAliasSpeedMap.begin(); it != m_lanesAliasSpeedMap.end();)
3250 {
3251 if (m_portListLaneMap.find(it->first) == m_portListLaneMap.end())
3252 {
3253 if (!addPort(it->first, get<1>(it->second), get<2>(it->second), get<3>(it->second)))
3254 {
3255 throw runtime_error("PortsOrch initialization failure.");
3256 }
3257 }
3258
3259 if (!initPort(get<0>(it->second), get<5>(it->second), get<4>(it->second), it->first))
3260 {
3261 // Failure has been recorded in initPort
3262 it++;
3263 continue;
3264 }
3265
3266 initPortSupportedSpeeds(get<0>(it->second), m_portListLaneMap[it->first]);
3267 initPortSupportedFecModes(get<0>(it->second), m_portListLaneMap[it->first]);
3268 it++;
3269 }
3270
3271 m_portConfigState = PORT_CONFIG_DONE;
3272 }
3273
3274 if (m_portConfigState != PORT_CONFIG_DONE)
3275 {
3276 // Not yet receive PortConfigDone. Save it for future retry
3277 it++;
3278 continue;
3279 }
3280
3281 if (alias == "PortConfigDone")
3282 {
3283 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3284 continue;
3285 }
3286
3287 if (!gBufferOrch->isPortReady(alias))
3288 {
3289 // buffer configuration hasn't been applied yet. save it for future retry
3290 m_pendingPortSet.emplace(alias);
3291 it++;
3292 continue;
3293 }
3294 else
3295 {
3296 m_pendingPortSet.erase(alias);
3297 }
3298
3299 Port p;
3300 if (!getPort(alias, p))
3301 {
3302 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get port id by alias:%s", alias.c_str());
3303 }
3304 else
3305 {
3306 if (admin_status.empty())
3307 {
3308 admin_status = p.m_admin_state_up ? "up" : "down";
3309 }
3310
3311 if (!an_str.empty())
3312 {
3313 if (autoneg_mode_map.find(an_str) == autoneg_mode_map.end())
3314 {
3315 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to parse autoneg value: %s", an_str.c_str());
3316 // Invalid auto negotiation mode configured, don't retry
3317 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3318 continue;
3319 }
3320 an = autoneg_mode_map[an_str];
3321 if (an != p.m_autoneg)
3322 {
3323 if (p.m_cap_an < 0)
3324 {
3325 initPortCapAutoNeg(p);
3326 m_portList[alias] = p;
3327 }
3328 if (p.m_cap_an < 1)
3329 {
3330 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("%s: autoneg is not supported (cap=%d)", p.m_alias.c_str(), p.m_cap_an);
3331 // autoneg is not supported, don't retry
3332 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3333 continue;
3334 }
3335 if (p.m_admin_state_up)
3336 {
3337 /* Bring port down before applying speed */
3338 if (!setPortAdminStatus(p, false))
3339 {
3340 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s admin status DOWN to set port autoneg mode", alias.c_str());
3341 it++;
3342 continue;
3343 }
3344
3345 p.m_admin_state_up = false;
3346 m_portList[alias] = p;
3347 }
3348
3349 auto status = setPortAutoNeg(p.m_port_id, an);
3350 if (status != task_success)
3351 {
3352 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s AN from %d to %d", alias.c_str(), p.m_autoneg, an);
3353 if (status == task_need_retry)
3354 {
3355 it++;
3356 }
3357 else
3358 {
3359 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3360 }
3361 continue;
3362 }
3363 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Set port %s AutoNeg from %d to %d", alias.c_str(), p.m_autoneg, an);
3364 p.m_autoneg = static_cast<swss::Port::AutoNegMode>(an);
3365 m_portList[alias] = p;
3366 m_portStateTable.hdel(p.m_alias, "rmt_adv_speeds");
3367 updatePortStatePoll(p, PORT_STATE_POLL_AN, (an > 0));
3368 }
3369 }
3370
3371 if (!lt_str.empty() && (p.m_type == Port::PHY))
3372 {
3373 if (link_training_mode_map.find(lt_str) == link_training_mode_map.end())
3374 {
3375 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to parse LT value: %s", lt_str.c_str());
3376 // Invalid link training mode configured, don't retry
3377 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3378 continue;
3379 }
3380
3381 lt = link_training_mode_map[lt_str];
3382 if (lt != p.m_link_training)
3383 {
3384 if (p.m_cap_lt < 0)
3385 {
3386 initPortCapLinkTraining(p);
3387 m_portList[alias] = p;
3388 }
3389 if (p.m_cap_lt < 1)
3390 {
3391 SWSS_LOG_WARN("%s: LT is not supported(cap=%d)", alias.c_str(), p.m_cap_lt);
3392 // Don't retry
3393 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3394 continue;
3395 }
3396
3397 auto status = setPortLinkTraining(p, lt > 0 ? true : false);
3398 if (status != task_success)
3399 {
3400 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s LT from %d to %d", alias.c_str(), p.m_link_training, lt);
3401 if (status == task_need_retry)
3402 {
3403 it++;
3404 }
3405 else
3406 {
3407 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3408 }
3409 continue;
3410 }
3411 m_portStateTable.hset(alias, "link_training_status", lt_str);
3412 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Set port %s LT from %d to %d", alias.c_str(), p.m_link_training, lt);
3413 p.m_link_training = lt;
3414 m_portList[alias] = p;
3415 updatePortStatePoll(p, PORT_STATE_POLL_LT, (lt > 0));
3416
3417 // Restore pre-emphasis when LT is transitioned from ON to OFF
3418 if ((p.m_link_training < 1) && (serdes_attr.size() == 0))
3419 {
3420 serdes_attr = p.m_preemphasis;
3421 }
3422 }
3423 }
3424
3425 if (speed != 0)
3426 {
3427 if (speed != p.m_speed)
3428 {
3429 if (!isSpeedSupported(alias, p.m_port_id, speed))
3430 {
3431 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Unsupported port speed %u", speed);
3432 // Speed not supported, dont retry
3433 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3434 continue;
3435 }
3436
3437 // for backward compatible, if p.m_autoneg != 1, toggle admin status
3438 if (p.m_admin_state_up && p.m_autoneg != 1)
3439 {
3440 /* Bring port down before applying speed */
3441 if (!setPortAdminStatus(p, false))
3442 {
3443 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s admin status DOWN to set speed", alias.c_str());
3444 it++;
3445 continue;
3446 }
3447
3448 p.m_admin_state_up = false;
3449 m_portList[alias] = p;
3450 }
3451
3452 auto status = setPortSpeed(p, speed);
3453 if (status != task_success)
3454 {
3455 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s speed from %u to %u", alias.c_str(), p.m_speed, speed);
3456 if (status == task_need_retry)
3457 {
3458 it++;
3459 }
3460 else
3461 {
3462 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3463 }
3464 continue;
3465 }
3466
3467 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Set port %s speed from %u to %u", alias.c_str(), p.m_speed, speed);
3468 p.m_speed = speed;
3469 m_portList[alias] = p;
3470 }
3471 else
3472 {
3473 /* Always update Gearbox speed on Gearbox ports */
3474 setGearboxPortsAttr(p, SAI_PORT_ATTR_SPEED, &speed);
3475 }
3476 }
3477
3478 if (!adv_speeds_str.empty())
3479 {
3480 boost::to_lower(adv_speeds_str);
3481 if (!getPortAdvSpeedsVal(adv_speeds_str, adv_speeds))
3482 {
3483 // Invalid advertised speeds configured, dont retry
3484 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3485 continue;
3486 }
3487
3488 if (adv_speeds != p.m_adv_speeds)
3489 {
3490 if (p.m_admin_state_up && p.m_autoneg == 1)
3491 {
3492 /* Bring port down before applying speed */
3493 if (!setPortAdminStatus(p, false))
3494 {
3495 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s admin status DOWN to set interface type", alias.c_str());
3496 it++;
3497 continue;
3498 }
3499
3500 p.m_admin_state_up = false;
3501 m_portList[alias] = p;
3502 }
3503
3504 auto ori_adv_speeds = swss::join(',', p.m_adv_speeds.begin(), p.m_adv_speeds.end());
3505 auto status = setPortAdvSpeeds(p.m_port_id, adv_speeds);
3506 if (status != task_success)
3507 {
3508
3509 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s advertised speed from %s to %s", alias.c_str(),
3510 ori_adv_speeds.c_str(),
3511 adv_speeds_str.c_str());
3512 if (status == task_need_retry)
3513 {
3514 it++;
3515 }
3516 else
3517 {
3518 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3519 }
3520 continue;
3521 }
3522 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Set port %s advertised speed from %s to %s", alias.c_str(),
3523 ori_adv_speeds.c_str(),
3524 adv_speeds_str.c_str());
3525 p.m_adv_speeds.swap(adv_speeds);
3526 m_portList[alias] = p;
3527 }
3528 }
3529
3530 if (!interface_type_str.empty())
3531 {
3532 boost::to_lower(interface_type_str);
3533 if (!getPortInterfaceTypeVal(interface_type_str, interface_type))
3534 {
3535 // Invalid interface type configured, dont retry
3536 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3537 continue;
3538 }
3539
3540 if (interface_type != p.m_interface_type)
3541 {
3542 if (p.m_admin_state_up && p.m_autoneg == 0)
3543 {
3544 /* Bring port down before applying speed */
3545 if (!setPortAdminStatus(p, false))
3546 {
3547 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s admin status DOWN to set interface type", alias.c_str());
3548 it++;
3549 continue;
3550 }
3551
3552 p.m_admin_state_up = false;
3553 m_portList[alias] = p;
3554 }
3555
3556 auto status = setPortInterfaceType(p.m_port_id, interface_type);
3557 if (status != task_success)
3558 {
3559 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s interface type to %s", alias.c_str(), interface_type_str.c_str());
3560 if (status == task_need_retry)
3561 {
3562 it++;
3563 }
3564 else
3565 {
3566 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3567 }
3568 continue;
3569 }
3570
3571 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Set port %s interface type to %s", alias.c_str(), interface_type_str.c_str());
3572 p.m_interface_type = interface_type;
3573 m_portList[alias] = p;
3574 }
3575 }
3576
3577 if (!adv_interface_types_str.empty())
3578 {
3579 boost::to_lower(adv_interface_types_str);
3580 if (!getPortAdvInterfaceTypesVal(adv_interface_types_str, adv_interface_types))
3581 {
3582 // Invalid advertised interface types configured, dont retry
3583 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3584 continue;
3585 }
3586
3587 if (adv_interface_types != p.m_adv_interface_types && p.m_autoneg == 1)
3588 {
3589 if (p.m_admin_state_up)
3590 {
3591 /* Bring port down before applying speed */
3592 if (!setPortAdminStatus(p, false))
3593 {
3594 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s admin status DOWN to set interface type", alias.c_str());
3595 it++;
3596 continue;
3597 }
3598
3599 p.m_admin_state_up = false;
3600 m_portList[alias] = p;
3601 }
3602
3603 auto status = setPortAdvInterfaceTypes(p.m_port_id, adv_interface_types);
3604 if (status != task_success)
3605 {
3606 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s advertised interface type to %s", alias.c_str(), adv_interface_types_str.c_str());
3607 if (status == task_need_retry)
3608 {
3609 it++;
3610 }
3611 else
3612 {
3613 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3614 }
3615 continue;
3616 }
3617
3618 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Set port %s advertised interface type to %s", alias.c_str(), adv_interface_types_str.c_str());
3619 p.m_adv_interface_types.swap(adv_interface_types);
3620 m_portList[alias] = p;
3621 }
3622 }
3623
3624 if (mtu != 0 && mtu != p.m_mtu)
3625 {
3626 if (setPortMtu(p, mtu))
3627 {
3628 p.m_mtu = mtu;
3629 m_portList[alias] = p;
3630 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Set port %s MTU to %u", alias.c_str(), mtu);
3631 if (p.m_rif_id)
3632 {
3633 gIntfsOrch->setRouterIntfsMtu(p);
3634 }
3635 // Sub interfaces inherit parent physical port mtu
3636 updateChildPortsMtu(p, mtu);
3637 }
3638 else
3639 {
3640 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s MTU to %u", alias.c_str(), mtu);
3641 it++;
3642 continue;
3643 }
3644 }
3645
3646 if (tpid != 0 && tpid != p.m_tpid)
3647 {
3648 SWSS_LOG_DEBUG("Set port %s TPID to 0x%x", alias.c_str(), tpid);
3649 if (setPortTpid(p.m_port_id, tpid))
3650 {
3651 p.m_tpid = tpid;
3652 m_portList[alias] = p;
3653 }
3654 else
3655 {
3656 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s TPID to 0x%x", alias.c_str(), tpid);
3657 it++;
3658 continue;
3659 }
3660 }
3661
3662 if (!fec_mode.empty())
3663 {
3664 if (fec_mode_map.find(fec_mode) != fec_mode_map.end())
3665 {
3666 /* reset fec mode upon mode change */
3667 if (!p.m_fec_cfg || p.m_fec_mode != fec_mode_map[fec_mode])
3668 {
3669 if (p.m_admin_state_up)
3670 {
3671 /* Bring port down before applying fec mode*/
3672 if (!setPortAdminStatus(p, false))
3673 {
3674 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s admin status DOWN to set fec mode", alias.c_str());
3675 it++;
3676 continue;
3677 }
3678
3679 p.m_admin_state_up = false;
3680 p.m_fec_mode = fec_mode_map[fec_mode];
3681 p.m_fec_cfg = true;
3682
3683 if (setPortFec(p, fec_mode))
3684 {
3685 m_portList[alias] = p;
3686 }
3687 else
3688 {
3689 it++;
3690 continue;
3691 }
3692 }
3693 else
3694 {
3695 /* Port is already down, setting fec mode*/
3696 p.m_fec_mode = fec_mode_map[fec_mode];
3697 p.m_fec_cfg = true;
3698 if (setPortFec(p, fec_mode))
3699 {
3700 m_portList[alias] = p;
3701 }
3702 else
3703 {
3704 it++;
3705 continue;
3706 }
3707 }
3708 }
3709 }
3710 else
3711 {
3712 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Unknown fec mode %s", fec_mode.c_str());
3713 }
3714 }
3715
3716 if (!learn_mode.empty() && (p.m_learn_mode != learn_mode))
3717 {
3718 if (p.m_bridge_port_id != SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID)
3719 {
3720 if(setBridgePortLearnMode(p, learn_mode))
3721 {
3722 p.m_learn_mode = learn_mode;
3723 m_portList[alias] = p;
3724 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Set port %s learn mode to %s", alias.c_str(), learn_mode.c_str());
3725 }
3726 else
3727 {
3728 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s learn mode to %s", alias.c_str(), learn_mode.c_str());
3729 it++;
3730 continue;
3731 }
3732 }
3733 else
3734 {
3735 p.m_learn_mode = learn_mode;
3736 m_portList[alias] = p;
3737
3738 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Saved to set port %s learn mode %s", alias.c_str(), learn_mode.c_str());
3739 }
3740 }
3741
3742 if (pfc_asym != "")
3743 {
3744 if (setPortPfcAsym(p, pfc_asym))
3745 {
3746 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Set port %s asymmetric PFC to %s", alias.c_str(), pfc_asym.c_str());
3747 }
3748 else
3749 {
3750 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s asymmetric PFC to %s", alias.c_str(), pfc_asym.c_str());
3751 it++;
3752 continue;
3753 }
3754 }
3755
3756 if (serdes_attr.size() != 0)
3757 {
3758 if (p.m_link_training > 0)
3759 {
3760 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Save port %s preemphasis for LT", alias.c_str());
3761 p.m_preemphasis = serdes_attr;
3762 m_portList[alias] = p;
3763 }
3764 else if (setPortSerdesAttribute(p.m_port_id, gSwitchId, serdes_attr))
3765 {
3766 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Set port %s preemphasis is success", alias.c_str());
3767 p.m_preemphasis = serdes_attr;
3768 m_portList[alias] = p;
3769 }
3770 else
3771 {
3772 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s pre-emphasis", alias.c_str());
3773 it++;
3774 continue;
3775 }
3776 }
3777
3778 /* create host_tx_ready field in state-db */
3779 initHostTxReadyState(p);
3780
3781 /* Last step set port admin status */
3782 if (!admin_status.empty() && (p.m_admin_state_up != (admin_status == "up")))
3783 {
3784 if (setPortAdminStatus(p, admin_status == "up"))
3785 {
3786 p.m_admin_state_up = (admin_status == "up");
3787 m_portList[alias] = p;
3788 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Set port %s admin status to %s", alias.c_str(), admin_status.c_str());
3789 }
3790 else
3791 {
3792 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s admin status to %s", alias.c_str(), admin_status.c_str());
3793 it++;
3794 continue;
3795 }
3796 }
3797 }
3798 }
3799 else if (op == DEL_COMMAND)
3800 {
3801 if (m_port_ref_count[alias] > 0)
3802 {
3803 SWSS_LOG_WARN("Unable to remove port %s: ref count %u", alias.c_str(), m_port_ref_count[alias]);
3804 it++;
3805 continue;
3806 }
3807
3808 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Deleting Port %s", alias.c_str());
3809 auto port_id = m_portList[alias].m_port_id;
3810 auto hif_id = m_portList[alias].m_hif_id;
3811 auto bridge_port_oid = m_portList[alias].m_bridge_port_id;
3812
3813 if (bridge_port_oid != SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID)
3814 {
3815 // Bridge port OID is set on a port as long as
3816 // port is part of at-least one VLAN.
3817 // Ideally this should be tracked by SAI redis.
3818 // Until then, let this snippet be here.
3819 SWSS_LOG_WARN("Cannot remove port as bridge port OID is present %" PRIx64 , bridge_port_oid);
3820 it++;
3821 continue;
3822 }
3823
3824 if (m_portList[alias].m_init)
3825 {
3826 deInitPort(alias, port_id);
3827 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Removing hostif %" PRIx64 " for Port %s", hif_id, alias.c_str());
3828 sai_status_t status = sai_hostif_api->remove_hostif(hif_id);
3829 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
3830 {
3831 throw runtime_error("Remove hostif for the port failed");
3832 }
3833
3834 Port p;
3835 if (getPort(port_id, p))
3836 {
3837 PortUpdate update = {p, false};
3838 notify(SUBJECT_TYPE_PORT_CHANGE, static_cast<void *>(&update));
3839 }
3840 }
3841
3842 sai_status_t status = removePort(port_id);
3843 if (SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS != status)
3844 {
3845 if (SAI_STATUS_OBJECT_IN_USE != status)
3846 {
3847 throw runtime_error("Delete port failed");
3848 }
3849 SWSS_LOG_WARN("Failed to remove port %" PRIx64 ", as the object is in use", port_id);
3850 it++;
3851 continue;
3852 }
3853 removePortFromLanesMap(alias);
3854 removePortFromPortListMap(port_id);
3855
3856 /* Delete port from port list */
3857 m_portList.erase(alias);
3858 saiOidToAlias.erase(port_id);
3859 }
3860 else
3861 {
3862 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Unknown operation type %s", op.c_str());
3863 }
3864
3865 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3866 }
3867}
3868
3869void PortsOrch::doVlanTask(Consumer &consumer)
3870{
3871 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
3872
3873 auto it = consumer.m_toSync.begin();
3874 while (it != consumer.m_toSync.end())
3875 {
3876 auto &t = it->second;
3877
3878 string key = kfvKey(t);
3879
3880 /* Ensure the key starts with "Vlan" otherwise ignore */
3881 if (strncmp(key.c_str(), VLAN_PREFIX, 4))
3882 {
3883 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Invalid key format. No 'Vlan' prefix: %s", key.c_str());
3884 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3885 continue;
3886 }
3887
3888 int vlan_id;
3889 vlan_id = stoi(key.substr(4)); // FIXME: might raise exception
3890
3891 string vlan_alias;
3892 vlan_alias = VLAN_PREFIX + to_string(vlan_id);
3893 string op = kfvOp(t);
3894
3895 if (op == SET_COMMAND)
3896 {
3897 // Retrieve attributes
3898 uint32_t mtu = 0;
3899 MacAddress mac;
3900 string hostif_name = "";
3901 for (auto i : kfvFieldsValues(t))
3902 {
3903 if (fvField(i) == "mtu")
3904 {
3905 mtu = (uint32_t)stoul(fvValue(i));
3906 }
3907 if (fvField(i) == "mac")
3908 {
3909 mac = MacAddress(fvValue(i));
3910 }
3911 if (fvField(i) == "host_ifname")
3912 {
3913 hostif_name = fvValue(i);
3914 }
3915 }
3916
3917 /*
3918 * Only creation is supported for now.
3919 * We may add support for VLAN mac learning enable/disable,
3920 * VLAN flooding control setting and etc. in the future.
3921 */
3922 if (m_portList.find(vlan_alias) == m_portList.end())
3923 {
3924 if (!addVlan(vlan_alias))
3925 {
3926 it++;
3927 continue;
3928 }
3929 }
3930
3931 // Process attributes
3932 Port vl;
3933 if (!getPort(vlan_alias, vl))
3934 {
3935 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get VLAN %s", vlan_alias.c_str());
3936 }
3937 else
3938 {
3939 if (mtu != 0)
3940 {
3941 vl.m_mtu = mtu;
3942 m_portList[vlan_alias] = vl;
3943 if (vl.m_rif_id)
3944 {
3945 gIntfsOrch->setRouterIntfsMtu(vl);
3946 }
3947 }
3948 if (mac)
3949 {
3950 vl.m_mac = mac;
3951 m_portList[vlan_alias] = vl;
3952 if (vl.m_rif_id)
3953 {
3954 gIntfsOrch->setRouterIntfsMac(vl);
3955 }
3956 }
3957 if (!hostif_name.empty())
3958 {
3959 if (!createVlanHostIntf(vl, hostif_name))
3960 {
3961 // No need to fail in case of error as this is for monitoring VLAN.
3962 // Error message is printed by "createVlanHostIntf" so just handle failure gracefully.
3963 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3964 continue;
3965 }
3966 }
3967 }
3968
3969 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3970 }
3971 else if (op == DEL_COMMAND)
3972 {
3973 Port vlan;
3974 getPort(vlan_alias, vlan);
3975
3976 if (removeVlan(vlan))
3977 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3978 else
3979 it++;
3980 }
3981 else
3982 {
3983 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Unknown operation type %s", op.c_str());
3984 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
3985 }
3986 }
3987}
3988
3989void PortsOrch::doVlanMemberTask(Consumer &consumer)
3990{
3991 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
3992
3993 auto it = consumer.m_toSync.begin();
3994 while (it != consumer.m_toSync.end())
3995 {
3996 auto &t = it->second;
3997
3998 string key = kfvKey(t);
3999
4000 /* Ensure the key starts with "Vlan" otherwise ignore */
4001 if (strncmp(key.c_str(), VLAN_PREFIX, 4))
4002 {
4003 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Invalid key format. No 'Vlan' prefix: %s", key.c_str());
4004 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4005 continue;
4006 }
4007
4008 key = key.substr(4);
4009 size_t found = key.find(':');
4010 int vlan_id;
4011 string vlan_alias, port_alias;
4012 if (found != string::npos)
4013 {
4014 vlan_id = stoi(key.substr(0, found)); // FIXME: might raise exception
4015 port_alias = key.substr(found+1);
4016 }
4017 else
4018 {
4019 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Invalid key format. No member port is presented: %s",
4020 kfvKey(t).c_str());
4021 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4022 continue;
4023 }
4024
4025 vlan_alias = VLAN_PREFIX + to_string(vlan_id);
4026 string op = kfvOp(t);
4027
4028 assert(m_portList.find(vlan_alias) != m_portList.end());
4029 Port vlan, port;
4030
4031 /* When VLAN member is to be created before VLAN is created */
4032 if (!getPort(vlan_alias, vlan))
4033 {
4034 SWSS_LOG_INFO("Failed to locate VLAN %s", vlan_alias.c_str());
4035 it++;
4036 continue;
4037 }
4038
4039 if (!getPort(port_alias, port))
4040 {
4041 SWSS_LOG_DEBUG("%s is not not yet created, delaying", port_alias.c_str());
4042 it++;
4043 continue;
4044 }
4045
4046 if (op == SET_COMMAND)
4047 {
4048 string tagging_mode = "untagged";
4049
4050 for (auto i : kfvFieldsValues(t))
4051 {
4052 if (fvField(i) == "tagging_mode")
4053 tagging_mode = fvValue(i);
4054 }
4055
4056 if (tagging_mode != "untagged" &&
4057 tagging_mode != "tagged" &&
4058 tagging_mode != "priority_tagged")
4059 {
4060 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Wrong tagging_mode '%s' for key: %s", tagging_mode.c_str(), kfvKey(t).c_str());
4061 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4062 continue;
4063 }
4064
4065 /* Duplicate entry */
4066 if (vlan.m_members.find(port_alias) != vlan.m_members.end())
4067 {
4068 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4069 continue;
4070 }
4071
4072 if (addBridgePort(port) && addVlanMember(vlan, port, tagging_mode))
4073 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4074 else
4075 it++;
4076 }
4077 else if (op == DEL_COMMAND)
4078 {
4079 if (vlan.m_members.find(port_alias) != vlan.m_members.end())
4080 {
4081 if (removeVlanMember(vlan, port))
4082 {
4083 if (m_portVlanMember[port.m_alias].empty())
4084 {
4085 removeBridgePort(port);
4086 }
4087 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4088 }
4089 else
4090 {
4091 it++;
4092 }
4093 }
4094 else
4095 /* Cannot locate the VLAN */
4096 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4097 }
4098 else
4099 {
4100 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Unknown operation type %s", op.c_str());
4101 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4102 }
4103 }
4104}
4105
4106void PortsOrch::doLagTask(Consumer &consumer)
4107{
4108 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
4109
4110 string table_name = consumer.getTableName();
4111
4112 auto it = consumer.m_toSync.begin();
4113 while (it != consumer.m_toSync.end())
4114 {
4115 auto &t = it->second;
4116
4117 string alias = kfvKey(t);
4118 string op = kfvOp(t);
4119
4120 if (op == SET_COMMAND)
4121 {
4122 // Retrieve attributes
4123 uint32_t mtu = 0;
4124 string learn_mode;
4125 string operation_status;
4126 uint32_t lag_id = 0;
4127 int32_t switch_id = -1;
4128 string tpid_string;
4129 uint16_t tpid = 0;
4130
4131 for (auto i : kfvFieldsValues(t))
4132 {
4133 if (fvField(i) == "mtu")
4134 {
4135 mtu = (uint32_t)stoul(fvValue(i));
4136 }
4137 else if (fvField(i) == "learn_mode")
4138 {
4139 learn_mode = fvValue(i);
4140 }
4141 else if (fvField(i) == "oper_status")
4142 {
4143 operation_status = fvValue(i);
4144 if (!string_oper_status.count(operation_status))
4145 {
4146 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Invalid operation status value:%s", operation_status.c_str());
4147 it++;
4148 continue;
4149 }
4150 }
4151 else if (fvField(i) == "lag_id")
4152 {
4153 lag_id = (uint32_t)stoul(fvValue(i));
4154 }
4155 else if (fvField(i) == "switch_id")
4156 {
4157 switch_id = stoi(fvValue(i));
4158 }
4159 else if (fvField(i) == "tpid")
4160 {
4161 tpid_string = fvValue(i);
4162 // Need to get rid of the leading 0x
4163 tpid_string.erase(0,2);
4164 tpid = (uint16_t)stoi(tpid_string, 0, 16);
4165 SWSS_LOG_DEBUG("reading TPID string:%s to uint16: 0x%x", tpid_string.c_str(), tpid);
4166 }
4167 }
4168
4169 if (table_name == CHASSIS_APP_LAG_TABLE_NAME)
4170 {
4171 if (switch_id == gVoqMySwitchId)
4172 {
4173 //Already created, syncd local lag from CHASSIS_APP_DB. Skip
4174 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4175 continue;
4176 }
4177 }
4178 else
4179 {
4180 // For local portchannel
4181
4182 lag_id = 0;
4183 switch_id = -1;
4184 }
4185
4186 if (m_portList.find(alias) == m_portList.end())
4187 {
4188 if (!addLag(alias, lag_id, switch_id))
4189 {
4190 it++;
4191 continue;
4192 }
4193 }
4194
4195 // Process attributes
4196 Port l;
4197 if (!getPort(alias, l))
4198 {
4199 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get LAG %s", alias.c_str());
4200 }
4201 else
4202 {
4203 if (!operation_status.empty())
4204 {
4205 updatePortOperStatus(l, string_oper_status.at(operation_status));
4206
4207 m_portList[alias] = l;
4208 }
4209
4210 if (mtu != 0)
4211 {
4212 l.m_mtu = mtu;
4213 m_portList[alias] = l;
4214 if (l.m_rif_id)
4215 {
4216 gIntfsOrch->setRouterIntfsMtu(l);
4217 }
4218 // Sub interfaces inherit parent LAG mtu
4219 updateChildPortsMtu(l, mtu);
4220 }
4221
4222 if (tpid != 0)
4223 {
4224 if (tpid != l.m_tpid)
4225 {
4226 if(!setLagTpid(l.m_lag_id, tpid))
4227 {
4228 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set LAG %s TPID 0x%x", alias.c_str(), tpid);
4229 }
4230 else
4231 {
4232 SWSS_LOG_DEBUG("Set LAG %s TPID to 0x%x", alias.c_str(), tpid);
4233 l.m_tpid = tpid;
4234 m_portList[alias] = l;
4235 }
4236 }
4237 }
4238
4239 if (!learn_mode.empty() && (l.m_learn_mode != learn_mode))
4240 {
4241 if (l.m_bridge_port_id != SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID)
4242 {
4243 if(setBridgePortLearnMode(l, learn_mode))
4244 {
4245 l.m_learn_mode = learn_mode;
4246 m_portList[alias] = l;
4247 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Set port %s learn mode to %s", alias.c_str(), learn_mode.c_str());
4248 }
4249 else
4250 {
4251 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s learn mode to %s", alias.c_str(), learn_mode.c_str());
4252 it++;
4253 continue;
4254 }
4255 }
4256 else
4257 {
4258 l.m_learn_mode = learn_mode;
4259 m_portList[alias] = l;
4260
4261 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Saved to set port %s learn mode %s", alias.c_str(), learn_mode.c_str());
4262 }
4263 }
4264 }
4265
4266 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4267 }
4268 else if (op == DEL_COMMAND)
4269 {
4270 Port lag;
4271 /* Cannot locate LAG */
4272 if (!getPort(alias, lag))
4273 {
4274 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4275 continue;
4276 }
4277
4278 if (removeLag(lag))
4279 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4280 else
4281 it++;
4282 }
4283 else
4284 {
4285 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Unknown operation type %s", op.c_str());
4286 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4287 }
4288 }
4289}
4290
4291void PortsOrch::doLagMemberTask(Consumer &consumer)
4292{
4293 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
4294
4295 string table_name = consumer.getTableName();
4296
4297 auto it = consumer.m_toSync.begin();
4298 while (it != consumer.m_toSync.end())
4299 {
4300 auto &t = it->second;
4301
4302 /* Retrieve LAG alias and LAG member alias from key */
4303 string key = kfvKey(t);
4304 size_t found = key.find(':');
4305 /* Return if the format of key is wrong */
4306 if (found == string::npos)
4307 {
4308 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to parse %s", key.c_str());
4309 return;
4310 }
4311 string lag_alias = key.substr(0, found);
4312 string port_alias = key.substr(found+1);
4313
4314 string op = kfvOp(t);
4315
4316 Port lag, port;
4317 if (!getPort(lag_alias, lag))
4318 {
4319 SWSS_LOG_INFO("Failed to locate LAG %s", lag_alias.c_str());
4320 it++;
4321 continue;
4322 }
4323
4324 if (!getPort(port_alias, port))
4325 {
4326 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to locate port %s", port_alias.c_str());
4327 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4328 continue;
4329 }
4330
4331 /* Fail if a port type is not a valid type for being a LAG member port.
4332 * Erase invalid entry, no need to retry in this case. */
4333 if (!isValidPortTypeForLagMember(port))
4334 {
4335 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("LAG member port has to be of type PHY or SYSTEM");
4336 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4337 continue;
4338 }
4339
4340 if (table_name == CHASSIS_APP_LAG_MEMBER_TABLE_NAME)
4341 {
4342 int32_t lag_switch_id = lag.m_system_lag_info.switch_id;
4343 if (lag_switch_id == gVoqMySwitchId)
4344 {
4345 //Synced local member addition to local lag. Skip
4346 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4347 continue;
4348 }
4349
4350 //Sanity check: The switch id-s of lag and member must match
4351 int32_t port_switch_id = port.m_system_port_info.switch_id;
4352 if (port_switch_id != lag_switch_id)
4353 {
4354 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("System lag switch id mismatch. Lag %s switch id: %d, Member %s switch id: %d",
4355 lag_alias.c_str(), lag_switch_id, port_alias.c_str(), port_switch_id);
4356 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4357 continue;
4358 }
4359 }
4360
4361 /* Update a LAG member */
4362 if (op == SET_COMMAND)
4363 {
4364 string status;
4365 for (auto i : kfvFieldsValues(t))
4366 {
4367 if (fvField(i) == "status")
4368 status = fvValue(i);
4369 }
4370
4371 if (lag.m_members.find(port_alias) == lag.m_members.end())
4372 {
4373 if (port.m_lag_member_id != SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID)
4374 {
4375 SWSS_LOG_INFO("Port %s is already a LAG member", port.m_alias.c_str());
4376 it++;
4377 continue;
4378 }
4379
4380 if (!addLagMember(lag, port, (status == "enabled")))
4381 {
4382 it++;
4383 continue;
4384 }
4385 }
4386
4387 /* Sync an enabled member */
4388 if (status == "enabled")
4389 {
4390 /* enable collection first, distribution-only mode
4391 * is not supported on Mellanox platform
4392 */
4393 if (setCollectionOnLagMember(port, true) &&
4394 setDistributionOnLagMember(port, true))
4395 {
4396 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4397 }
4398 else
4399 {
4400 it++;
4401 continue;
4402 }
4403 }
4404 /* Sync an disabled member */
4405 else /* status == "disabled" */
4406 {
4407 /* disable distribution first, distribution-only mode
4408 * is not supported on Mellanox platform
4409 */
4410 if (setDistributionOnLagMember(port, false) &&
4411 setCollectionOnLagMember(port, false))
4412 {
4413 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4414 }
4415 else
4416 {
4417 it++;
4418 continue;
4419 }
4420 }
4421 }
4422 /* Remove a LAG member */
4423 else if (op == DEL_COMMAND)
4424 {
4425 /* Assert the LAG member exists */
4426 assert(lag.m_members.find(port_alias) != lag.m_members.end());
4427
4428 if (!port.m_lag_id || !port.m_lag_member_id)
4429 {
4430 SWSS_LOG_WARN("Member %s not found in LAG %s lid:%" PRIx64 " lmid:%" PRIx64 ",",
4431 port.m_alias.c_str(), lag.m_alias.c_str(), lag.m_lag_id, port.m_lag_member_id);
4432 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4433 continue;
4434 }
4435
4436 if (removeLagMember(lag, port))
4437 {
4438 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4439 }
4440 else
4441 {
4442 it++;
4443 }
4444 }
4445 else
4446 {
4447 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Unknown operation type %s", op.c_str());
4448 it = consumer.m_toSync.erase(it);
4449 }
4450 }
4451}
4452
4453void PortsOrch::doTask()
4454{
4455 auto tableOrder = {
4456 APP_PORT_TABLE_NAME,
4457 APP_LAG_TABLE_NAME,
4458 APP_LAG_MEMBER_TABLE_NAME,
4459 APP_VLAN_TABLE_NAME,
4460 APP_VLAN_MEMBER_TABLE_NAME,
4461 };
4462
4463 for (auto tableName: tableOrder)
4464 {
4465 auto consumer = getExecutor(tableName);
4466 consumer->drain();
4467 }
4468
4469 // drain remaining tables
4470 for (auto& it: m_consumerMap)
4471 {
4472 auto tableName = it.first;
4473 auto consumer = it.second.get();
4474 if (find(tableOrder.begin(), tableOrder.end(), tableName) == tableOrder.end())
4475 {
4476 consumer->drain();
4477 }
4478 }
4479}
4480
4481void PortsOrch::doTask(Consumer &consumer)
4482{
4483 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
4484
4485 string table_name = consumer.getTableName();
4486
4487 if (table_name == APP_PORT_TABLE_NAME)
4488 {
4489 doPortTask(consumer);
4490 }
4491 else
4492 {
4493 /* Wait for all ports to be initialized */
4494 if (!allPortsReady())
4495 {
4496 return;
4497 }
4498
4499 if (table_name == APP_VLAN_TABLE_NAME)
4500 {
4501 doVlanTask(consumer);
4502 }
4503 else if (table_name == APP_VLAN_MEMBER_TABLE_NAME)
4504 {
4505 doVlanMemberTask(consumer);
4506 }
4507 else if (table_name == APP_LAG_TABLE_NAME || table_name == CHASSIS_APP_LAG_TABLE_NAME)
4508 {
4509 doLagTask(consumer);
4510 }
4511 else if (table_name == APP_LAG_MEMBER_TABLE_NAME || table_name == CHASSIS_APP_LAG_MEMBER_TABLE_NAME)
4512 {
4513 doLagMemberTask(consumer);
4514 }
4515 }
4516}
4517
4518void PortsOrch::initializeVoqs(Port &port)
4519{
4520 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
4521
4522 sai_attribute_t attr;
4523 attr.id = SAI_SYSTEM_PORT_ATTR_QOS_NUMBER_OF_VOQS;
4524 sai_status_t status = sai_system_port_api->get_system_port_attribute(
4525 port.m_system_port_oid, 1, &attr);
4526 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
4527 {
4528 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get number of voqs for port %s rv:%d", port.m_alias.c_str(), status);
4529 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiGetStatus(SAI_API_PORT, status);
4530 if (handle_status != task_process_status::task_success)
4531 {
4532 throw runtime_error("PortsOrch initialization failure.");
4533 }
4534 }
4535 SWSS_LOG_INFO("Get %d voq for port %s", attr.value.u32, port.m_alias.c_str());
4536
4537 m_port_voq_ids[port.m_alias] = std::vector<sai_object_id_t>( attr.value.u32 );
4538
4539 if (attr.value.u32 == 0)
4540 {
4541 return;
4542 }
4543
4544 attr.id = SAI_SYSTEM_PORT_ATTR_QOS_VOQ_LIST;
4545 attr.value.objlist.count = (uint32_t) m_port_voq_ids[port.m_alias].size();
4546 attr.value.objlist.list = m_port_voq_ids[port.m_alias].data();
4547
4548 status = sai_system_port_api->get_system_port_attribute(
4549 port.m_system_port_oid, 1, &attr);
4550 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
4551 {
4552 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get voq list for port %s rv:%d", port.m_alias.c_str(), status);
4553 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiGetStatus(SAI_API_PORT, status);
4554 if (handle_status != task_process_status::task_success)
4555 {
4556 throw runtime_error("PortsOrch initialization failure.");
4557 }
4558 }
4559
4560 SWSS_LOG_INFO("Get voqs for port %s", port.m_alias.c_str());
4561}
4562
4563void PortsOrch::initializeQueues(Port &port)
4564{
4565 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
4566
4567 sai_attribute_t attr;
4568 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_QOS_NUMBER_OF_QUEUES;
4569 sai_status_t status = sai_port_api->get_port_attribute(port.m_port_id, 1, &attr);
4570 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
4571 {
4572 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get number of queues for port %s rv:%d", port.m_alias.c_str(), status);
4573 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiGetStatus(SAI_API_PORT, status);
4574 if (handle_status != task_process_status::task_success)
4575 {
4576 throw runtime_error("PortsOrch initialization failure.");
4577 }
4578 }
4579 SWSS_LOG_INFO("Get %d queues for port %s", attr.value.u32, port.m_alias.c_str());
4580
4581 port.m_queue_ids.resize(attr.value.u32);
4582 port.m_queue_lock.resize(attr.value.u32);
4583
4584 if (attr.value.u32 == 0)
4585 {
4586 return;
4587 }
4588
4589 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_QOS_QUEUE_LIST;
4590 attr.value.objlist.count = (uint32_t)port.m_queue_ids.size();
4591 attr.value.objlist.list = port.m_queue_ids.data();
4592
4593 status = sai_port_api->get_port_attribute(port.m_port_id, 1, &attr);
4594 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
4595 {
4596 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get queue list for port %s rv:%d", port.m_alias.c_str(), status);
4597 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiGetStatus(SAI_API_PORT, status);
4598 if (handle_status != task_process_status::task_success)
4599 {
4600 throw runtime_error("PortsOrch initialization failure.");
4601 }
4602 }
4603
4604 SWSS_LOG_INFO("Get queues for port %s", port.m_alias.c_str());
4605}
4606
4607void PortsOrch::initializeSchedulerGroups(Port &port)
4608{
4609 std::vector<sai_object_id_t> scheduler_group_ids;
4610 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
4611
4612 sai_attribute_t attr;
4613 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_QOS_NUMBER_OF_SCHEDULER_GROUPS;
4614 sai_status_t status = sai_port_api->get_port_attribute(port.m_port_id, 1, &attr);
4615 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
4616 {
4617 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get number of scheduler groups for port:%s", port.m_alias.c_str());
4618 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiGetStatus(SAI_API_PORT, status);
4619 if (handle_status != task_process_status::task_success)
4620 {
4621 throw runtime_error("PortsOrch initialization failure.");
4622 }
4623 }
4624 SWSS_LOG_INFO("Got %d number of scheduler groups for port %s", attr.value.u32, port.m_alias.c_str());
4625
4626 scheduler_group_ids.resize(attr.value.u32);
4627
4628 if (attr.value.u32 == 0)
4629 {
4630 return;
4631 }
4632
4633 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_QOS_SCHEDULER_GROUP_LIST;
4634 attr.value.objlist.count = (uint32_t)scheduler_group_ids.size();
4635 attr.value.objlist.list = scheduler_group_ids.data();
4636
4637 status = sai_port_api->get_port_attribute(port.m_port_id, 1, &attr);
4638 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
4639 {
4640 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get scheduler group list for port %s rv:%d", port.m_alias.c_str(), status);
4641 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiGetStatus(SAI_API_PORT, status);
4642 if (handle_status != task_process_status::task_success)
4643 {
4644 throw runtime_error("PortsOrch initialization failure.");
4645 }
4646 }
4647
4648 SWSS_LOG_INFO("Got scheduler groups for port %s", port.m_alias.c_str());
4649}
4650
4651void PortsOrch::initializePriorityGroups(Port &port)
4652{
4653 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
4654
4655 sai_attribute_t attr;
4656 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_NUMBER_OF_INGRESS_PRIORITY_GROUPS;
4657 sai_status_t status = sai_port_api->get_port_attribute(port.m_port_id, 1, &attr);
4658 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
4659 {
4660 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get number of priority groups for port %s rv:%d", port.m_alias.c_str(), status);
4661 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiGetStatus(SAI_API_PORT, status);
4662 if (handle_status != task_process_status::task_success)
4663 {
4664 throw runtime_error("PortsOrch initialization failure.");
4665 }
4666 }
4667 SWSS_LOG_INFO("Get %d priority groups for port %s", attr.value.u32, port.m_alias.c_str());
4668
4669 port.m_priority_group_ids.resize(attr.value.u32);
4670
4671 if (attr.value.u32 == 0)
4672 {
4673 return;
4674 }
4675
4676 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_INGRESS_PRIORITY_GROUP_LIST;
4677 attr.value.objlist.count = (uint32_t)port.m_priority_group_ids.size();
4678 attr.value.objlist.list = port.m_priority_group_ids.data();
4679
4680 status = sai_port_api->get_port_attribute(port.m_port_id, 1, &attr);
4681 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
4682 {
4683 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Fail to get priority group list for port %s rv:%d", port.m_alias.c_str(), status);
4684 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiGetStatus(SAI_API_PORT, status);
4685 if (handle_status != task_process_status::task_success)
4686 {
4687 throw runtime_error("PortsOrch initialization failure.");
4688 }
4689 }
4690 SWSS_LOG_INFO("Get priority groups for port %s", port.m_alias.c_str());
4691}
4692
4693void PortsOrch::initializePortBufferMaximumParameters(Port &port)
4694{
4695 sai_attribute_t attr;
4696 vector<FieldValueTuple> fvVector;
4697
4698 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_QOS_MAXIMUM_HEADROOM_SIZE;
4699
4700 sai_status_t status = sai_port_api->get_port_attribute(port.m_port_id, 1, &attr);
4701 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
4702 {
4703 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Unable to get the maximum headroom for port %s rv:%d, ignored", port.m_alias.c_str(), status);
4704 }
4705 else
4706 {
4707 port.m_maximum_headroom = attr.value.u32;
4708 fvVector.emplace_back("max_headroom_size", to_string(port.m_maximum_headroom));
4709 }
4710
4711 fvVector.emplace_back("max_priority_groups", to_string(port.m_priority_group_ids.size()));
4712 fvVector.emplace_back("max_queues", to_string(port.m_queue_ids.size()));
4713
4714 m_stateBufferMaximumValueTable->set(port.m_alias, fvVector);
4715}
4716
4717bool PortsOrch::initializePort(Port &port)
4718{
4719 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
4720
4721 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Initializing port alias:%s pid:%" PRIx64, port.m_alias.c_str(), port.m_port_id);
4722
4723 initializePriorityGroups(port);
4724 initializeQueues(port);
4725 initializeSchedulerGroups(port);
4726 initializePortBufferMaximumParameters(port);
4727
4728 /* Create host interface */
4729 if (!addHostIntfs(port, port.m_alias, port.m_hif_id))
4730 {
4731 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to create host interface for port %s", port.m_alias.c_str());
4732 return false;
4733 }
4734
4735 /* Check warm start states */
4736 vector<FieldValueTuple> tuples;
4737 bool exist = m_portTable->get(port.m_alias, tuples);
4738 string operStatus;
4739 if (exist)
4740 {
4741 for (auto i : tuples)
4742 {
4743 if (fvField(i) == "oper_status")
4744 {
4745 operStatus = fvValue(i);
4746 }
4747 }
4748 }
4749 SWSS_LOG_DEBUG("initializePort %s with oper %s", port.m_alias.c_str(), operStatus.c_str());
4750
4755 if (operStatus == "up")
4756 {
4757 port.m_oper_status = SAI_PORT_OPER_STATUS_UP;
4758 }
4759 else if (operStatus.empty())
4760 {
4761 port.m_oper_status = SAI_PORT_OPER_STATUS_DOWN;
4762 /* Fill oper_status in db with default value "down" */
4763 m_portTable->hset(port.m_alias, "oper_status", "down");
4764 }
4765 else
4766 {
4767 port.m_oper_status = SAI_PORT_OPER_STATUS_DOWN;
4768 }
4769
4770 /* initialize port admin status */
4771 if (!getPortAdminStatus(port.m_port_id, port.m_admin_state_up))
4772 {
4773 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get initial port admin status %s", port.m_alias.c_str());
4774 return false;
4775 }
4776
4777 /* initialize port admin speed */
4778 if (!isAutoNegEnabled(port.m_port_id) && !getPortSpeed(port.m_port_id, port.m_speed))
4779 {
4780 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get initial port admin speed %d", port.m_speed);
4781 return false;
4782 }
4783
4784 /* initialize port mtu */
4785 if (!getPortMtu(port, port.m_mtu))
4786 {
4787 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get initial port mtu %d", port.m_mtu);
4788 }
4789
4790 /*
4791 * always initialize Port SAI_HOSTIF_ATTR_OPER_STATUS based on oper_status value in appDB.
4792 */
4793 bool isUp = port.m_oper_status == SAI_PORT_OPER_STATUS_UP;
4794 if (!setHostIntfsOperStatus(port, isUp))
4795 {
4796 SWSS_LOG_WARN("Failed to set operation status %s to host interface %s",
4797 operStatus.c_str(), port.m_alias.c_str());
4798 return false;
4799 }
4800
4801 return true;
4802}
4803
4804bool PortsOrch::addHostIntfs(Port &port, string alias, sai_object_id_t &host_intfs_id)
4805{
4806 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
4807
4808 sai_attribute_t attr;
4809 vector<sai_attribute_t> attrs;
4810
4811 attr.id = SAI_HOSTIF_ATTR_TYPE;
4812 attr.value.s32 = SAI_HOSTIF_TYPE_NETDEV;
4813 attrs.push_back(attr);
4814
4815 attr.id = SAI_HOSTIF_ATTR_OBJ_ID;
4816 attr.value.oid = port.m_port_id;
4817 attrs.push_back(attr);
4818
4819 attr.id = SAI_HOSTIF_ATTR_NAME;
4820 strncpy((char *)&attr.value.chardata, alias.c_str(), SAI_HOSTIF_NAME_SIZE);
4821 if (alias.length() >= SAI_HOSTIF_NAME_SIZE)
4822 {
4823 SWSS_LOG_WARN("Host interface name %s is too long and will be truncated to %d bytes", alias.c_str(), SAI_HOSTIF_NAME_SIZE - 1);
4824 }
4825 attr.value.chardata[SAI_HOSTIF_NAME_SIZE - 1] = '\0';
4826 attrs.push_back(attr);
4827
4828 sai_status_t status = sai_hostif_api->create_hostif(&host_intfs_id, gSwitchId, (uint32_t)attrs.size(), attrs.data());
4829 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
4830 {
4831 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to create host interface for port %s", alias.c_str());
4832 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiCreateStatus(SAI_API_HOSTIF, status);
4833 if (handle_status != task_success)
4834 {
4835 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
4836 }
4837 }
4838
4839 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Create host interface for port %s", alias.c_str());
4840
4841 return true;
4842}
4843
4844bool PortsOrch::setBridgePortLearningFDB(Port &port, sai_bridge_port_fdb_learning_mode_t mode)
4845{
4846 // TODO: how to support 1D bridge?
4847 if (port.m_type != Port::PHY) return false;
4848
4849 auto bridge_port_id = port.m_bridge_port_id;
4850 if (bridge_port_id == SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID) return false;
4851
4852 sai_attribute_t bport_attr;
4853 bport_attr.id = SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_ATTR_FDB_LEARNING_MODE;
4854 bport_attr.value.s32 = mode;
4855 auto status = sai_bridge_api->set_bridge_port_attribute(bridge_port_id, &bport_attr);
4856 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
4857 {
4858 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set bridge port %" PRIx64 " learning_mode attribute: %d", bridge_port_id, status);
4859 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiSetStatus(SAI_API_BRIDGE, status);
4860 if (handle_status != task_success)
4861 {
4862 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
4863 }
4864 }
4865 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Disable FDB learning on bridge port %s(%" PRIx64 ")", port.m_alias.c_str(), bridge_port_id);
4866 return true;
4867}
4868
4869bool PortsOrch::addBridgePort(Port &port)
4870{
4871 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
4872
4873 if (port.m_bridge_port_id != SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID)
4874 {
4875 return true;
4876 }
4877
4878 sai_attribute_t attr;
4879 vector<sai_attribute_t> attrs;
4880
4881 if (port.m_type == Port::PHY)
4882 {
4883 attr.id = SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_ATTR_TYPE;
4884 attr.value.s32 = SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_TYPE_PORT;
4885 attrs.push_back(attr);
4886
4887 attr.id = SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_ATTR_PORT_ID;
4888 attr.value.oid = port.m_port_id;
4889 attrs.push_back(attr);
4890 }
4891 else if (port.m_type == Port::LAG)
4892 {
4893 attr.id = SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_ATTR_TYPE;
4894 attr.value.s32 = SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_TYPE_PORT;
4895 attrs.push_back(attr);
4896
4897 attr.id = SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_ATTR_PORT_ID;
4898 attr.value.oid = port.m_lag_id;
4899 attrs.push_back(attr);
4900 }
4901 else if (port.m_type == Port::TUNNEL)
4902 {
4903 attr.id = SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_ATTR_TYPE;
4904 attr.value.s32 = SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_TYPE_TUNNEL;
4905 attrs.push_back(attr);
4906
4907 attr.id = SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_ATTR_TUNNEL_ID;
4908 attr.value.oid = port.m_tunnel_id;
4909 attrs.push_back(attr);
4910
4911 attr.id = SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_ATTR_BRIDGE_ID;
4912 attr.value.oid = m_default1QBridge;
4913 attrs.push_back(attr);
4914 }
4915 else
4916 {
4917 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to add bridge port %s to default 1Q bridge, invalid port type %d",
4918 port.m_alias.c_str(), port.m_type);
4919 return false;
4920 }
4921
4922 /* Create a bridge port with admin status set to UP */
4923 attr.id = SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_ATTR_ADMIN_STATE;
4924 attr.value.booldata = true;
4925 attrs.push_back(attr);
4926
4927 /* And with hardware FDB learning mode set to HW (explicit default value) */
4928 attr.id = SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_ATTR_FDB_LEARNING_MODE;
4929 auto found = learn_mode_map.find(port.m_learn_mode);
4930 if (found == learn_mode_map.end())
4931 {
4932 attr.value.s32 = SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_FDB_LEARNING_MODE_HW;
4933 }
4934 else
4935 {
4936 attr.value.s32 = found->second;
4937 }
4938 attrs.push_back(attr);
4939
4940 sai_status_t status = sai_bridge_api->create_bridge_port(&port.m_bridge_port_id, gSwitchId, (uint32_t)attrs.size(), attrs.data());
4941 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
4942 {
4943 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to add bridge port %s to default 1Q bridge, rv:%d",
4944 port.m_alias.c_str(), status);
4945 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiCreateStatus(SAI_API_BRIDGE, status);
4946 if (handle_status != task_success)
4947 {
4948 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
4949 }
4950 }
4951
4952 if (!setHostIntfsStripTag(port, SAI_HOSTIF_VLAN_TAG_KEEP))
4953 {
4954 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set %s for hostif of port %s",
4955 hostif_vlan_tag[SAI_HOSTIF_VLAN_TAG_KEEP], port.m_alias.c_str());
4956 return false;
4957 }
4958 m_portList[port.m_alias] = port;
4959 saiOidToAlias[port.m_bridge_port_id] = port.m_alias;
4960 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Add bridge port %s to default 1Q bridge", port.m_alias.c_str());
4961
4962 PortUpdate update = { port, true };
4963 notify(SUBJECT_TYPE_BRIDGE_PORT_CHANGE, static_cast<void *>(&update));
4964
4965 return true;
4966}
4967
4968bool PortsOrch::removeBridgePort(Port &port)
4969{
4970 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
4971
4972 if (port.m_bridge_port_id == SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID)
4973 {
4974 return true;
4975 }
4976 /* Set bridge port admin status to DOWN */
4977 sai_attribute_t attr;
4978 attr.id = SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_ATTR_ADMIN_STATE;
4979 attr.value.booldata = false;
4980
4981 sai_status_t status = sai_bridge_api->set_bridge_port_attribute(port.m_bridge_port_id, &attr);
4982 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
4983 {
4984 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set bridge port %s admin status to DOWN, rv:%d",
4985 port.m_alias.c_str(), status);
4986 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiSetStatus(SAI_API_BRIDGE, status);
4987 if (handle_status != task_success)
4988 {
4989 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
4990 }
4991 }
4992
4993 if (!setHostIntfsStripTag(port, SAI_HOSTIF_VLAN_TAG_STRIP))
4994 {
4995 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set %s for hostif of port %s",
4996 hostif_vlan_tag[SAI_HOSTIF_VLAN_TAG_STRIP], port.m_alias.c_str());
4997 return false;
4998 }
4999
5000 //Flush the FDB entires corresponding to the port
5001 gFdbOrch->flushFDBEntries(port.m_bridge_port_id, SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID);
5002 SWSS_LOG_INFO("Flush FDB entries for port %s", port.m_alias.c_str());
5003
5004 /* Remove bridge port */
5005 status = sai_bridge_api->remove_bridge_port(port.m_bridge_port_id);
5006 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5007 {
5008 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to remove bridge port %s from default 1Q bridge, rv:%d",
5009 port.m_alias.c_str(), status);
5010 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiRemoveStatus(SAI_API_BRIDGE, status);
5011 if (handle_status != task_success)
5012 {
5013 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5014 }
5015 }
5016 saiOidToAlias.erase(port.m_bridge_port_id);
5017 port.m_bridge_port_id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID;
5018
5019 /* Remove bridge port */
5020 PortUpdate update = { port, false };
5021 notify(SUBJECT_TYPE_BRIDGE_PORT_CHANGE, static_cast<void *>(&update));
5022
5023 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Remove bridge port %s from default 1Q bridge", port.m_alias.c_str());
5024
5025 m_portList[port.m_alias] = port;
5026 return true;
5027}
5028
5029bool PortsOrch::setBridgePortLearnMode(Port &port, string learn_mode)
5030{
5031 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
5032
5033 if (port.m_bridge_port_id == SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID)
5034 {
5035 return true;
5036 }
5037
5038 auto found = learn_mode_map.find(learn_mode);
5039 if (found == learn_mode_map.end())
5040 {
5041 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Incorrect MAC learn mode: %s", learn_mode.c_str());
5042 return false;
5043 }
5044
5045 /* Set bridge port learning mode */
5046 sai_attribute_t attr;
5047 attr.id = SAI_BRIDGE_PORT_ATTR_FDB_LEARNING_MODE;
5048 attr.value.s32 = found->second;
5049
5050 sai_status_t status = sai_bridge_api->set_bridge_port_attribute(port.m_bridge_port_id, &attr);
5051 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5052 {
5053 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set bridge port %s learning mode, rv:%d",
5054 port.m_alias.c_str(), status);
5055 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiSetStatus(SAI_API_BRIDGE, status);
5056 if (handle_status != task_success)
5057 {
5058 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5059 }
5060 }
5061
5062 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Set bridge port %s learning mode %s", port.m_alias.c_str(), learn_mode.c_str());
5063
5064 return true;
5065}
5066
5067bool PortsOrch::addVlan(string vlan_alias)
5068{
5069 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
5070
5071 sai_object_id_t vlan_oid;
5072
5073 sai_vlan_id_t vlan_id = (uint16_t)stoi(vlan_alias.substr(4));
5074 sai_attribute_t attr;
5075 attr.id = SAI_VLAN_ATTR_VLAN_ID;
5076 attr.value.u16 = vlan_id;
5077
5078 sai_status_t status = sai_vlan_api->create_vlan(&vlan_oid, gSwitchId, 1, &attr);
5079
5080 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5081 {
5082 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to create VLAN %s vid:%hu", vlan_alias.c_str(), vlan_id);
5083 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiCreateStatus(SAI_API_VLAN, status);
5084 if (handle_status != task_success)
5085 {
5086 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5087 }
5088 }
5089
5090 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Create an empty VLAN %s vid:%hu vlan_oid:%" PRIx64, vlan_alias.c_str(), vlan_id, vlan_oid);
5091
5092 Port vlan(vlan_alias, Port::VLAN);
5093 vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_oid = vlan_oid;
5094 vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id = vlan_id;
5095 vlan.m_vlan_info.uuc_flood_type = SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_ALL;
5096 vlan.m_vlan_info.bc_flood_type = SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_ALL;
5097 vlan.m_members = set<string>();
5098 m_portList[vlan_alias] = vlan;
5099 m_port_ref_count[vlan_alias] = 0;
5100 saiOidToAlias[vlan_oid] = vlan_alias;
5101
5102 return true;
5103}
5104
5105bool PortsOrch::removeVlan(Port vlan)
5106{
5107 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
5108
5109 /* If there are still fdb entries associated with the VLAN,
5110 return false for retry */
5111 if (vlan.m_fdb_count > 0)
5112 {
5113 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("VLAN %s still has %d FDB entries", vlan.m_alias.c_str(), vlan.m_fdb_count);
5114 return false;
5115 }
5116
5117 if (m_port_ref_count[vlan.m_alias] > 0)
5118 {
5119 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to remove ref count %d VLAN %s",
5120 m_port_ref_count[vlan.m_alias],
5121 vlan.m_alias.c_str());
5122 return false;
5123 }
5124
5125 /* Vlan removing is not allowed when the VLAN still has members */
5126 if (vlan.m_members.size() > 0)
5127 {
5128 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to remove non-empty VLAN %s", vlan.m_alias.c_str());
5129 return false;
5130 }
5131
5132 // Fail VLAN removal if there is a vnid associated
5133 if (vlan.m_vnid != VNID_NONE)
5134 {
5135 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("VLAN-VNI mapping not yet removed. VLAN %s VNI %d",
5136 vlan.m_alias.c_str(), vlan.m_vnid);
5137 return false;
5138 }
5139
5140
5141 if (vlan.m_vlan_info.host_intf_id && !removeVlanHostIntf(vlan))
5142 {
5143 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to remove VLAN %d host interface", vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id);
5144 return false;
5145 }
5146
5147 sai_status_t status = sai_vlan_api->remove_vlan(vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_oid);
5148 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5149 {
5150 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to remove VLAN %s vid:%hu",
5151 vlan.m_alias.c_str(), vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id);
5152 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiRemoveStatus(SAI_API_VLAN, status);
5153 if (handle_status != task_success)
5154 {
5155 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5156 }
5157 }
5158
5159 removeAclTableGroup(vlan);
5160
5161 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Remove VLAN %s vid:%hu", vlan.m_alias.c_str(),
5162 vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id);
5163
5164 saiOidToAlias.erase(vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_oid);
5165 m_portList.erase(vlan.m_alias);
5166 m_port_ref_count.erase(vlan.m_alias);
5167
5168 return true;
5169}
5170
5171bool PortsOrch::getVlanByVlanId(sai_vlan_id_t vlan_id, Port &vlan)
5172{
5173 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
5174
5175 for (auto &it: m_portList)
5176 {
5177 if (it.second.m_type == Port::VLAN && it.second.m_vlan_info.vlan_id == vlan_id)
5178 {
5179 vlan = it.second;
5180 return true;
5181 }
5182 }
5183
5184 return false;
5185}
5186
5187bool PortsOrch::addVlanMember(Port &vlan, Port &port, string &tagging_mode, string end_point_ip)
5188{
5189 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
5190
5191 if (!end_point_ip.empty())
5192 {
5193 if ((uuc_sup_flood_control_type.find(SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_COMBINED)
5194 == uuc_sup_flood_control_type.end()) ||
5195 (bc_sup_flood_control_type.find(SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_COMBINED)
5196 == bc_sup_flood_control_type.end()))
5197 {
5198 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Flood group with end point ip is not supported");
5199 return false;
5200 }
5201 return addVlanFloodGroups(vlan, port, end_point_ip);
5202 }
5203
5204 sai_attribute_t attr;
5205 vector<sai_attribute_t> attrs;
5206
5207 attr.id = SAI_VLAN_MEMBER_ATTR_VLAN_ID;
5208 attr.value.oid = vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_oid;
5209 attrs.push_back(attr);
5210
5211 attr.id = SAI_VLAN_MEMBER_ATTR_BRIDGE_PORT_ID;
5212 attr.value.oid = port.m_bridge_port_id;
5213 attrs.push_back(attr);
5214
5215
5216 sai_vlan_tagging_mode_t sai_tagging_mode = SAI_VLAN_TAGGING_MODE_TAGGED;
5217 attr.id = SAI_VLAN_MEMBER_ATTR_VLAN_TAGGING_MODE;
5218 if (tagging_mode == "untagged")
5219 sai_tagging_mode = SAI_VLAN_TAGGING_MODE_UNTAGGED;
5220 else if (tagging_mode == "tagged")
5221 sai_tagging_mode = SAI_VLAN_TAGGING_MODE_TAGGED;
5222 else if (tagging_mode == "priority_tagged")
5223 sai_tagging_mode = SAI_VLAN_TAGGING_MODE_PRIORITY_TAGGED;
5224 else assert(false);
5225 attr.value.s32 = sai_tagging_mode;
5226 attrs.push_back(attr);
5227
5228 sai_object_id_t vlan_member_id;
5229 sai_status_t status = sai_vlan_api->create_vlan_member(&vlan_member_id, gSwitchId, (uint32_t)attrs.size(), attrs.data());
5230 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5231 {
5232 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to add member %s to VLAN %s vid:%hu pid:%" PRIx64,
5233 port.m_alias.c_str(), vlan.m_alias.c_str(), vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id, port.m_port_id);
5234 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiCreateStatus(SAI_API_VLAN, status);
5235 if (handle_status != task_success)
5236 {
5237 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5238 }
5239 }
5240 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Add member %s to VLAN %s vid:%hu pid%" PRIx64,
5241 port.m_alias.c_str(), vlan.m_alias.c_str(), vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id, port.m_port_id);
5242
5243 /* Use untagged VLAN as pvid of the member port */
5244 if (sai_tagging_mode == SAI_VLAN_TAGGING_MODE_UNTAGGED)
5245 {
5246 if(!setPortPvid(port, vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id))
5247 {
5248 return false;
5249 }
5250 }
5251
5252 /* a physical port may join multiple vlans */
5253 VlanMemberEntry vme = {vlan_member_id, sai_tagging_mode};
5254 m_portVlanMember[port.m_alias][vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id] = vme;
5255 m_portList[port.m_alias] = port;
5256 vlan.m_members.insert(port.m_alias);
5257 m_portList[vlan.m_alias] = vlan;
5258
5259 VlanMemberUpdate update = { vlan, port, true };
5260 notify(SUBJECT_TYPE_VLAN_MEMBER_CHANGE, static_cast<void *>(&update));
5261
5262 return true;
5263}
5264
5265bool PortsOrch::getPortVlanMembers(Port &port, vlan_members_t &vlan_members)
5266{
5267 vlan_members = m_portVlanMember[port.m_alias];
5268 return true;
5269}
5270
5271bool PortsOrch::addVlanFloodGroups(Port &vlan, Port &port, string end_point_ip)
5272{
5273 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
5274
5275 sai_object_id_t l2mc_group_id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID;
5276 sai_status_t status;
5277 sai_attribute_t attr;
5278
5279 if (vlan.m_vlan_info.uuc_flood_type != SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_COMBINED)
5280 {
5281 attr.id = SAI_VLAN_ATTR_UNKNOWN_UNICAST_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE;
5282 attr.value.s32 = SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_COMBINED;
5283
5284 status = sai_vlan_api->set_vlan_attribute(vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_oid, &attr);
5285 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5286 {
5287 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set l2mc flood type combined "
5288 " to vlan %hu for unknown unicast flooding", vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id);
5289 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiSetStatus(SAI_API_VLAN, status);
5290 if (handle_status != task_success)
5291 {
5292 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5293 }
5294 }
5295 vlan.m_vlan_info.uuc_flood_type = SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_COMBINED;
5296 }
5297
5298 if (vlan.m_vlan_info.bc_flood_type != SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_COMBINED)
5299 {
5300 attr.id = SAI_VLAN_ATTR_BROADCAST_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE;
5301 attr.value.s32 = SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_COMBINED;
5302
5303 status = sai_vlan_api->set_vlan_attribute(vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_oid, &attr);
5304 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5305 {
5306 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set l2mc flood type combined "
5307 " to vlan %hu for broadcast flooding", vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id);
5308 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiSetStatus(SAI_API_VLAN, status);
5309 if (handle_status != task_success)
5310 {
5311 m_portList[vlan.m_alias] = vlan;
5312 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5313 }
5314 }
5315 vlan.m_vlan_info.bc_flood_type = SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_COMBINED;
5316 }
5317
5318 if (vlan.m_vlan_info.l2mc_group_id == SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID)
5319 {
5320 status = sai_l2mc_group_api->create_l2mc_group(&l2mc_group_id, gSwitchId, 0, NULL);
5321 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5322 {
5323 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to create l2mc flood group");
5324 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiCreateStatus(SAI_API_L2MC_GROUP, status);
5325 if (handle_status != task_success)
5326 {
5327 m_portList[vlan.m_alias] = vlan;
5328 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5329 }
5330 }
5331
5332 if (vlan.m_vlan_info.uuc_flood_type == SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_COMBINED)
5333 {
5334 attr.id = SAI_VLAN_ATTR_UNKNOWN_UNICAST_FLOOD_GROUP;
5335 attr.value.oid = l2mc_group_id;
5336
5337 status = sai_vlan_api->set_vlan_attribute(vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_oid, &attr);
5338 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5339 {
5340 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set l2mc group %" PRIx64
5341 " to vlan %hu for unknown unicast flooding",
5342 l2mc_group_id, vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id);
5343 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiSetStatus(SAI_API_VLAN, status);
5344 if (handle_status != task_success)
5345 {
5346 m_portList[vlan.m_alias] = vlan;
5347 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5348 }
5349 }
5350 }
5351 if (vlan.m_vlan_info.bc_flood_type == SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_COMBINED)
5352 {
5353 attr.id = SAI_VLAN_ATTR_BROADCAST_FLOOD_GROUP;
5354 attr.value.oid = l2mc_group_id;
5355
5356 status = sai_vlan_api->set_vlan_attribute(vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_oid, &attr);
5357 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5358 {
5359 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set l2mc group %" PRIx64
5360 " to vlan %hu for broadcast flooding",
5361 l2mc_group_id, vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id);
5362 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiSetStatus(SAI_API_VLAN, status);
5363 if (handle_status != task_success)
5364 {
5365 m_portList[vlan.m_alias] = vlan;
5366 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5367 }
5368 }
5369 }
5370 vlan.m_vlan_info.l2mc_group_id = l2mc_group_id;
5371 m_portList[vlan.m_alias] = vlan;
5372 }
5373
5374 vector<sai_attribute_t> attrs;
5375 attr.id = SAI_L2MC_GROUP_MEMBER_ATTR_L2MC_GROUP_ID;
5376 attr.value.oid = vlan.m_vlan_info.l2mc_group_id;
5377 attrs.push_back(attr);
5378
5379 attr.id = SAI_L2MC_GROUP_MEMBER_ATTR_L2MC_OUTPUT_ID;
5380 attr.value.oid = port.m_bridge_port_id;
5381 attrs.push_back(attr);
5382
5383 attr.id = SAI_L2MC_GROUP_MEMBER_ATTR_L2MC_ENDPOINT_IP;
5384 IpAddress remote = IpAddress(end_point_ip);
5385 sai_ip_address_t ipaddr;
5386 if (remote.isV4())
5387 {
5388 ipaddr.addr_family = SAI_IP_ADDR_FAMILY_IPV4;
5389 ipaddr.addr.ip4 = remote.getV4Addr();
5390 }
5391 else
5392 {
5393 ipaddr.addr_family = SAI_IP_ADDR_FAMILY_IPV6;
5394 memcpy(ipaddr.addr.ip6, remote.getV6Addr(), sizeof(ipaddr.addr.ip6));
5395 }
5396 attr.value.ipaddr = ipaddr;
5397 attrs.push_back(attr);
5398
5399 sai_object_id_t l2mc_group_member = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID;
5400 status = sai_l2mc_group_api->create_l2mc_group_member(&l2mc_group_member, gSwitchId,
5401 static_cast<uint32_t>(attrs.size()),
5402 attrs.data());
5403 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5404 {
5405 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to create l2mc group member for adding tunnel %s to vlan %hu",
5406 end_point_ip.c_str(), vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id);
5407 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiCreateStatus(SAI_API_L2MC_GROUP, status);
5408 if (handle_status != task_success)
5409 {
5410 m_portList[vlan.m_alias] = vlan;
5411 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5412 }
5413 }
5414 vlan.m_vlan_info.l2mc_members[end_point_ip] = l2mc_group_member;
5415 m_portList[vlan.m_alias] = vlan;
5416 increaseBridgePortRefCount(port);
5417
5418 VlanMemberUpdate update = { vlan, port, true };
5419 notify(SUBJECT_TYPE_VLAN_MEMBER_CHANGE, static_cast<void *>(&update));
5420 return true;
5421}
5422
5423
5424bool PortsOrch::removeVlanEndPointIp(Port &vlan, Port &port, string end_point_ip)
5425{
5426 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
5427
5428 sai_status_t status;
5429
5430 if(vlan.m_vlan_info.l2mc_members.find(end_point_ip) == vlan.m_vlan_info.l2mc_members.end())
5431 {
5432 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("End point ip %s is not part of vlan %hu",
5433 end_point_ip.c_str(), vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id);
5434 return true;
5435 }
5436
5437 status = sai_l2mc_group_api->remove_l2mc_group_member(vlan.m_vlan_info.l2mc_members[end_point_ip]);
5438 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5439 {
5440 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to remove end point ip %s from vlan %hu",
5441 end_point_ip.c_str(), vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id);
5442 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiRemoveStatus(SAI_API_L2MC_GROUP, status);
5443 if (handle_status != task_success)
5444 {
5445 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5446 }
5447 }
5448 decreaseBridgePortRefCount(port);
5449 vlan.m_vlan_info.l2mc_members.erase(end_point_ip);
5450 sai_object_id_t l2mc_group_id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID;
5451 sai_attribute_t attr;
5452
5453 if (vlan.m_vlan_info.l2mc_members.empty())
5454 {
5455 if (vlan.m_vlan_info.uuc_flood_type == SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_COMBINED)
5456 {
5457 attr.id = SAI_VLAN_ATTR_UNKNOWN_UNICAST_FLOOD_GROUP;
5458 attr.value.oid = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID;
5459
5460 status = sai_vlan_api->set_vlan_attribute(vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_oid, &attr);
5461 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5462 {
5463 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set null l2mc group "
5464 " to vlan %hu for unknown unicast flooding",
5465 vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id);
5466 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiSetStatus(SAI_API_VLAN, status);
5467 if (handle_status != task_success)
5468 {
5469 m_portList[vlan.m_alias] = vlan;
5470 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5471 }
5472 }
5473 attr.id = SAI_VLAN_ATTR_UNKNOWN_UNICAST_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE;
5474 attr.value.s32 = SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_ALL;
5475 status = sai_vlan_api->set_vlan_attribute(vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_oid, &attr);
5476 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5477 {
5478 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set flood control type all"
5479 " to vlan %hu for unknown unicast flooding",
5480 vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id);
5481 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiSetStatus(SAI_API_VLAN, status);
5482 if (handle_status != task_success)
5483 {
5484 m_portList[vlan.m_alias] = vlan;
5485 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5486 }
5487 }
5488 vlan.m_vlan_info.uuc_flood_type = SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_ALL;
5489 }
5490 if (vlan.m_vlan_info.bc_flood_type == SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_COMBINED)
5491 {
5492 attr.id = SAI_VLAN_ATTR_BROADCAST_FLOOD_GROUP;
5493 attr.value.oid = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID;
5494
5495 status = sai_vlan_api->set_vlan_attribute(vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_oid, &attr);
5496 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5497 {
5498 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set null l2mc group "
5499 " to vlan %hu for broadcast flooding",
5500 vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id);
5501 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiSetStatus(SAI_API_VLAN, status);
5502 if (handle_status != task_success)
5503 {
5504 m_portList[vlan.m_alias] = vlan;
5505 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5506 }
5507 }
5508 attr.id = SAI_VLAN_ATTR_BROADCAST_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE;
5509 attr.value.s32 = SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_ALL;
5510 status = sai_vlan_api->set_vlan_attribute(vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_oid, &attr);
