5511 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5512 {
5513 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set flood control type all"
5514 " to vlan %hu for broadcast flooding",
5515 vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id);
5516 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiSetStatus(SAI_API_VLAN, status);
5517 if (handle_status != task_success)
5518 {
5519 m_portList[vlan.m_alias] = vlan;
5520 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5521 }
5522 }
5523 vlan.m_vlan_info.bc_flood_type = SAI_VLAN_FLOOD_CONTROL_TYPE_ALL;
5524 }
5525 status = sai_l2mc_group_api->remove_l2mc_group(vlan.m_vlan_info.l2mc_group_id);
5526 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5527 {
5528 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to remove l2mc group %" PRIx64, l2mc_group_id);
5529 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiRemoveStatus(SAI_API_L2MC_GROUP, status);
5530 if (handle_status != task_success)
5531 {
5532 m_portList[vlan.m_alias] = vlan;
5533 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5534 }
5535 }
5536 vlan.m_vlan_info.l2mc_group_id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID;
5537 }
5538 m_portList[vlan.m_alias] = vlan;
5539 return true;
5540}
5541
5542bool PortsOrch::removeVlanMember(Port &vlan, Port &port, string end_point_ip)
5543{
5544 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
5545
5546 if (!end_point_ip.empty())
5547 {
5548 return removeVlanEndPointIp(vlan, port, end_point_ip);
5549 }
5550 sai_object_id_t vlan_member_id;
5551 sai_vlan_tagging_mode_t sai_tagging_mode;
5552 auto vlan_member = m_portVlanMember[port.m_alias].find(vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id);
5553
5554 /* Assert the port belongs to this VLAN */
5555 assert (vlan_member != m_portVlanMember[port.m_alias].end());
5556 sai_tagging_mode = vlan_member->second.vlan_mode;
5557 vlan_member_id = vlan_member->second.vlan_member_id;
5558
5559 sai_status_t status = sai_vlan_api->remove_vlan_member(vlan_member_id);
5560 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5561 {
5562 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to remove member %s from VLAN %s vid:%hx vmid:%" PRIx64,
5563 port.m_alias.c_str(), vlan.m_alias.c_str(), vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id, vlan_member_id);
5564 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiRemoveStatus(SAI_API_VLAN, status);
5565 if (handle_status != task_success)
5566 {
5567 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5568 }
5569 }
5570 m_portVlanMember[port.m_alias].erase(vlan_member);
5571 if (m_portVlanMember[port.m_alias].empty())
5572 {
5573 m_portVlanMember.erase(port.m_alias);
5574 }
5575 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Remove member %s from VLAN %s lid:%hx vmid:%" PRIx64,
5576 port.m_alias.c_str(), vlan.m_alias.c_str(), vlan.m_vlan_info.vlan_id, vlan_member_id);
5577
5578 /* Restore to default pvid if this port joined this VLAN in untagged mode previously */
5579 if (sai_tagging_mode == SAI_VLAN_TAGGING_MODE_UNTAGGED)
5580 {
5581 if (!setPortPvid(port, DEFAULT_PORT_VLAN_ID))
5582 {
5583 return false;
5584 }
5585 }
5586
5587 m_portList[port.m_alias] = port;
5588 vlan.m_members.erase(port.m_alias);
5589 m_portList[vlan.m_alias] = vlan;
5590
5591 VlanMemberUpdate update = { vlan, port, false };
5592 notify(SUBJECT_TYPE_VLAN_MEMBER_CHANGE, static_cast<void *>(&update));
5593
5594 return true;
5595}
5596
5597bool PortsOrch::isVlanMember(Port &vlan, Port &port, string end_point_ip)
5598{
5599 if (!end_point_ip.empty())
5600 {
5601 if (vlan.m_vlan_info.l2mc_members.find(end_point_ip) != vlan.m_vlan_info.l2mc_members.end())
5602 {
5603 return true;
5604 }
5605 return false;
5606 }
5607 if (vlan.m_members.find(port.m_alias) == vlan.m_members.end())
5608 return false;
5609
5610 return true;
5611}
5612
5613bool PortsOrch::addLag(string lag_alias, uint32_t spa_id, int32_t switch_id)
5614{
5615 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
5616
5617 auto lagport = m_portList.find(lag_alias);
5618 if (lagport != m_portList.end())
5619 {
5620 /* The deletion of bridgeport attached to the lag may still be
5621 * pending due to fdb entries still present on the lag. Wait
5622 * until the cleanup is done.
5623 */
5624 if (m_portList[lag_alias].m_bridge_port_id != SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID)
5625 {
5626 return false;
5627 }
5628 return true;
5629 }
5630
5631 vector<sai_attribute_t> lag_attrs;
5632 string system_lag_alias = lag_alias;
5633
5634 if (gMySwitchType == "voq")
5635 {
5636 if (switch_id < 0)
5637 {
5638 // Local PortChannel. Allocate unique lag id from central CHASSIS_APP_DB
5639 // Use the chassis wide unique system lag name.
5640
5641 // Get the local switch id and derive the system lag name.
5642
5643 switch_id = gVoqMySwitchId;
5644 system_lag_alias = gMyHostName + "|" + gMyAsicName + "|" + lag_alias;
5645
5646 // Allocate unique lag id
5647 spa_id = m_lagIdAllocator->lagIdAdd(system_lag_alias, 0);
5648
5649 if ((int32_t)spa_id <= 0)
5650 {
5651 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to allocate unique LAG id for local lag %s rv:%d", lag_alias.c_str(), spa_id);
5652 return false;
5653 }
5654 }
5655
5656 sai_attribute_t attr;
5657 attr.id = SAI_LAG_ATTR_SYSTEM_PORT_AGGREGATE_ID;
5658 attr.value.u32 = spa_id;
5659 lag_attrs.push_back(attr);
5660 }
5661
5662 sai_object_id_t lag_id;
5663 sai_status_t status = sai_lag_api->create_lag(&lag_id, gSwitchId, static_cast<uint32_t>(lag_attrs.size()), lag_attrs.data());
5664
5665 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5666 {
5667 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to create LAG %s lid:%" PRIx64, lag_alias.c_str(), lag_id);
5668 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiCreateStatus(SAI_API_LAG, status);
5669 if (handle_status != task_success)
5670 {
5671 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5672 }
5673 }
5674
5675 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Create an empty LAG %s lid:%" PRIx64, lag_alias.c_str(), lag_id);
5676
5677 Port lag(lag_alias, Port::LAG);
5678 lag.m_lag_id = lag_id;
5679 lag.m_members = set<string>();
5680 m_portList[lag_alias] = lag;
5681 m_port_ref_count[lag_alias] = 0;
5682 saiOidToAlias[lag_id] = lag_alias;
5683
5684 PortUpdate update = { lag, true };
5685 notify(SUBJECT_TYPE_PORT_CHANGE, static_cast<void *>(&update));
5686
5687 FieldValueTuple tuple(lag_alias, sai_serialize_object_id(lag_id));
5688 vector<FieldValueTuple> fields;
5689 fields.push_back(tuple);
5690 m_counterLagTable->set("", fields);
5691
5692 if (gMySwitchType == "voq")
5693 {
5694 // If this is voq switch, record system lag info
5695
5696 lag.m_system_lag_info.alias = system_lag_alias;
5697 lag.m_system_lag_info.switch_id = switch_id;
5698 lag.m_system_lag_info.spa_id = spa_id;
5699
5700 // This will update port list with local port channel name for local port channels
5701 // and with system lag name for the system lags received from chassis app db
5702
5703 m_portList[lag_alias] = lag;
5704
5705 // Sync to SYSTEM_LAG_TABLE of CHASSIS_APP_DB
5706
5707 voqSyncAddLag(lag);
5708 }
5709
5710 return true;
5711}
5712
5713bool PortsOrch::removeLag(Port lag)
5714{
5715 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
5716
5717 if (m_port_ref_count[lag.m_alias] > 0)
5718 {
5719 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to remove ref count %d LAG %s",
5720 m_port_ref_count[lag.m_alias],
5721 lag.m_alias.c_str());
5722 return false;
5723 }
5724
5725 /* Retry when the LAG still has members */
5726 if (lag.m_members.size() > 0)
5727 {
5728 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to remove non-empty LAG %s", lag.m_alias.c_str());
5729 return false;
5730 }
5731 if (m_portVlanMember[lag.m_alias].size() > 0)
5732 {
5733 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to remove LAG %s, it is still in VLAN", lag.m_alias.c_str());
5734 return false;
5735 }
5736
5737 if (lag.m_bridge_port_id != SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID)
5738 {
5739 return false;
5740 }
5741
5742 sai_status_t status = sai_lag_api->remove_lag(lag.m_lag_id);
5743 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5744 {
5745 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to remove LAG %s lid:%" PRIx64, lag.m_alias.c_str(), lag.m_lag_id);
5746 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiRemoveStatus(SAI_API_LAG, status);
5747 if (handle_status != task_success)
5748 {
5749 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5750 }
5751 }
5752
5753 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Remove LAG %s lid:%" PRIx64, lag.m_alias.c_str(), lag.m_lag_id);
5754
5755 saiOidToAlias.erase(lag.m_lag_id);
5756 m_portList.erase(lag.m_alias);
5757 m_port_ref_count.erase(lag.m_alias);
5758
5759 PortUpdate update = { lag, false };
5760 notify(SUBJECT_TYPE_PORT_CHANGE, static_cast<void *>(&update));
5761
5762 m_counterLagTable->hdel("", lag.m_alias);
5763
5764 if (gMySwitchType == "voq")
5765 {
5766 // Free the lag id, if this is local LAG
5767
5768 if (lag.m_system_lag_info.switch_id == gVoqMySwitchId)
5769 {
5770 int32_t rv;
5771 int32_t spa_id = lag.m_system_lag_info.spa_id;
5772
5773 rv = m_lagIdAllocator->lagIdDel(lag.m_system_lag_info.alias);
5774
5775 if (rv != spa_id)
5776 {
5777 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to delete LAG id %d of local lag %s rv:%d", spa_id, lag.m_alias.c_str(), rv);
5778 return false;
5779 }
5780
5781 // Sync to SYSTEM_LAG_TABLE of CHASSIS_APP_DB
5782
5783 voqSyncDelLag(lag);
5784 }
5785 }
5786
5787 return true;
5788}
5789
5790void PortsOrch::getLagMember(Port &lag, vector<Port> &portv)
5791{
5792 Port member;
5793
5794 for (auto &name: lag.m_members)
5795 {
5796 if (!getPort(name, member))
5797 {
5798 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get port for %s alias", name.c_str());
5799 return;
5800 }
5801 portv.push_back(member);
5802 }
5803}
5804
5805bool PortsOrch::addLagMember(Port &lag, Port &port, bool enableForwarding)
5806{
5807 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
5808
5809 sai_uint32_t pvid;
5810 if (getPortPvid(lag, pvid))
5811 {
5812 setPortPvid (port, pvid);
5813 }
5814
5815 sai_attribute_t attr;
5816 vector<sai_attribute_t> attrs;
5817
5818 attr.id = SAI_LAG_MEMBER_ATTR_LAG_ID;
5819 attr.value.oid = lag.m_lag_id;
5820 attrs.push_back(attr);
5821
5822 attr.id = SAI_LAG_MEMBER_ATTR_PORT_ID;
5823 attr.value.oid = port.m_port_id;
5824 attrs.push_back(attr);
5825
5826 if (!enableForwarding && port.m_type != Port::SYSTEM)
5827 {
5828 attr.id = SAI_LAG_MEMBER_ATTR_EGRESS_DISABLE;
5829 attr.value.booldata = true;
5830 attrs.push_back(attr);
5831
5832 attr.id = SAI_LAG_MEMBER_ATTR_INGRESS_DISABLE;
5833 attr.value.booldata = true;
5834 attrs.push_back(attr);
5835 }
5836
5837 sai_object_id_t lag_member_id;
5838 sai_status_t status = sai_lag_api->create_lag_member(&lag_member_id, gSwitchId, (uint32_t)attrs.size(), attrs.data());
5839
5840 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5841 {
5842 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to add member %s to LAG %s lid:%" PRIx64 " pid:%" PRIx64,
5843 port.m_alias.c_str(), lag.m_alias.c_str(), lag.m_lag_id, port.m_port_id);
5844 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiCreateStatus(SAI_API_LAG, status);
5845 if (handle_status != task_success)
5846 {
5847 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5848 }
5849 }
5850
5851 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Add member %s to LAG %s lid:%" PRIx64 " pid:%" PRIx64,
5852 port.m_alias.c_str(), lag.m_alias.c_str(), lag.m_lag_id, port.m_port_id);
5853
5854 port.m_lag_id = lag.m_lag_id;
5855 port.m_lag_member_id = lag_member_id;
5856 m_portList[port.m_alias] = port;
5857 lag.m_members.insert(port.m_alias);
5858
5859 m_portList[lag.m_alias] = lag;
5860
5861 if (lag.m_bridge_port_id > 0)
5862 {
5863 if (!setHostIntfsStripTag(port, SAI_HOSTIF_VLAN_TAG_KEEP))
5864 {
5865 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set %s for hostif of port %s which is in LAG %s",
5866 hostif_vlan_tag[SAI_HOSTIF_VLAN_TAG_KEEP], port.m_alias.c_str(), lag.m_alias.c_str());
5867 return false;
5868 }
5869 }
5870
5871 increasePortRefCount(port.m_alias);
5872
5873 LagMemberUpdate update = { lag, port, true };
5874 notify(SUBJECT_TYPE_LAG_MEMBER_CHANGE, static_cast<void *>(&update));
5875
5876 if (gMySwitchType == "voq")
5877 {
5878 //Sync to SYSTEM_LAG_MEMBER_TABLE of CHASSIS_APP_DB
5879 voqSyncAddLagMember(lag, port);
5880 }
5881
5882 return true;
5883}
5884
5885bool PortsOrch::removeLagMember(Port &lag, Port &port)
5886{
5887 sai_status_t status = sai_lag_api->remove_lag_member(port.m_lag_member_id);
5888
5889 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5890 {
5891 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to remove member %s from LAG %s lid:%" PRIx64 " lmid:%" PRIx64,
5892 port.m_alias.c_str(), lag.m_alias.c_str(), lag.m_lag_id, port.m_lag_member_id);
5893 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiRemoveStatus(SAI_API_LAG, status);
5894 if (handle_status != task_success)
5895 {
5896 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5897 }
5898 }
5899
5900 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Remove member %s from LAG %s lid:%" PRIx64 " lmid:%" PRIx64,
5901 port.m_alias.c_str(), lag.m_alias.c_str(), lag.m_lag_id, port.m_lag_member_id);
5902
5903 port.m_lag_id = 0;
5904 port.m_lag_member_id = 0;
5905 m_portList[port.m_alias] = port;
5906 lag.m_members.erase(port.m_alias);
5907 m_portList[lag.m_alias] = lag;
5908
5909 if (lag.m_bridge_port_id > 0)
5910 {
5911 if (!setHostIntfsStripTag(port, SAI_HOSTIF_VLAN_TAG_STRIP))
5912 {
5913 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set %s for hostif of port %s which is leaving LAG %s",
5914 hostif_vlan_tag[SAI_HOSTIF_VLAN_TAG_STRIP], port.m_alias.c_str(), lag.m_alias.c_str());
5915 return false;
5916 }
5917 }
5918
5919 decreasePortRefCount(port.m_alias);
5920
5921 LagMemberUpdate update = { lag, port, false };
5922 notify(SUBJECT_TYPE_LAG_MEMBER_CHANGE, static_cast<void *>(&update));
5923
5924 if (gMySwitchType == "voq")
5925 {
5926 //Sync to SYSTEM_LAG_MEMBER_TABLE of CHASSIS_APP_DB
5927 voqSyncDelLagMember(lag, port);
5928 }
5929
5930 return true;
5931}
5932
5933bool PortsOrch::setLagTpid(sai_object_id_t id, sai_uint16_t tpid)
5934{
5935 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
5936 sai_status_t status = SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS;
5937 sai_attribute_t attr;
5938
5939 attr.id = SAI_LAG_ATTR_TPID;
5940
5941 attr.value.u16 = (uint16_t)tpid;
5942
5943 status = sai_lag_api->set_lag_attribute(id, &attr);
5944 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5945 {
5946 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set TPID 0x%x to LAG pid:%" PRIx64 ", rv:%d",
5947 attr.value.u16, id, status);
5948 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiSetStatus(SAI_API_LAG, status);
5949 if (handle_status != task_success)
5950 {
5951 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5952 }
5953 }
5954 else
5955 {
5956 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Set TPID 0x%x to LAG pid:%" PRIx64 , attr.value.u16, id);
5957 }
5958 return true;
5959}
5960
5961
5962bool PortsOrch::setCollectionOnLagMember(Port &lagMember, bool enableCollection)
5963{
5964 /* Port must be LAG member */
5965 assert(lagMember.m_lag_member_id);
5966
5967 // Collection is not applicable for system port lag members (i.e, members of remote LAGs)
5968 if (lagMember.m_type == Port::SYSTEM)
5969 {
5970 return true;
5971 }
5972
5973 sai_status_t status = SAI_STATUS_FAILURE;
5974 sai_attribute_t attr {};
5975
5976 attr.id = SAI_LAG_MEMBER_ATTR_INGRESS_DISABLE;
5977 attr.value.booldata = !enableCollection;
5978
5979 status = sai_lag_api->set_lag_member_attribute(lagMember.m_lag_member_id, &attr);
5980 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
5981 {
5982 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to %s collection on LAG member %s",
5983 enableCollection ? "enable" : "disable",
5984 lagMember.m_alias.c_str());
5985 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiSetStatus(SAI_API_LAG, status);
5986 if (handle_status != task_success)
5987 {
5988 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
5989 }
5990 }
5991
5992 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("%s collection on LAG member %s",
5993 enableCollection ? "Enable" : "Disable",
5994 lagMember.m_alias.c_str());
5995
5996 return true;
5997}
5998
5999bool PortsOrch::setDistributionOnLagMember(Port &lagMember, bool enableDistribution)
6000{
6001 /* Port must be LAG member */
6002 assert(lagMember.m_lag_member_id);
6003
6004 // Distribution is not applicable for system port lag members (i.e, members of remote LAGs)
6005 if (lagMember.m_type == Port::SYSTEM)
6006 {
6007 return true;
6008 }
6009
6010 sai_status_t status = SAI_STATUS_FAILURE;
6011 sai_attribute_t attr {};
6012
6013 attr.id = SAI_LAG_MEMBER_ATTR_EGRESS_DISABLE;
6014 attr.value.booldata = !enableDistribution;
6015
6016 status = sai_lag_api->set_lag_member_attribute(lagMember.m_lag_member_id, &attr);
6017 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
6018 {
6019 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to %s distribution on LAG member %s",
6020 enableDistribution ? "enable" : "disable",
6021 lagMember.m_alias.c_str());
6022 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiSetStatus(SAI_API_LAG, status);
6023 if (handle_status != task_success)
6024 {
6025 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
6026 }
6027 }
6028
6029 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("%s distribution on LAG member %s",
6030 enableDistribution ? "Enable" : "Disable",
6031 lagMember.m_alias.c_str());
6032
6033 return true;
6034}
6035
6036bool PortsOrch::addTunnel(string tunnel_alias, sai_object_id_t tunnel_id, bool hwlearning)
6037{
6038 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
6039
6040 Port tunnel(tunnel_alias, Port::TUNNEL);
6041 tunnel.m_tunnel_id = tunnel_id;
6042 if (hwlearning)
6043 {
6044 tunnel.m_learn_mode = "hardware";
6045 }
6046 else
6047 {
6048 tunnel.m_learn_mode = "disable";
6049 }
6050 m_portList[tunnel_alias] = tunnel;
6051
6052 SWSS_LOG_INFO("addTunnel:: %" PRIx64, tunnel_id);
6053
6054 return true;
6055}
6056
6057bool PortsOrch::removeTunnel(Port tunnel)
6058{
6059 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
6060
6061 m_portList.erase(tunnel.m_alias);
6062
6063 return true;
6064}
6065
6066void PortsOrch::generateQueueMap(map<string, FlexCounterQueueStates> queuesStateVector)
6067{
6068 if (m_isQueueMapGenerated)
6069 {
6070 return;
6071 }
6072
6073 for (const auto& it: m_portList)
6074 {
6075 if (it.second.m_type == Port::PHY)
6076 {
6077 if (!queuesStateVector.count(it.second.m_alias))
6078 {
6079 auto maxQueueNumber = getNumberOfPortSupportedQueueCounters(it.second.m_alias);
6080 FlexCounterQueueStates flexCounterQueueState(maxQueueNumber);
6081 queuesStateVector.insert(make_pair(it.second.m_alias, flexCounterQueueState));
6082 }
6083 generateQueueMapPerPort(it.second, queuesStateVector.at(it.second.m_alias), false);
6084 if (gMySwitchType == "voq")
6085 {
6086 generateQueueMapPerPort(it.second, queuesStateVector.at(it.second.m_alias), true);
6087 }
6088 }
6089
6090 if (it.second.m_type == Port::SYSTEM)
6091 {
6092 if (!queuesStateVector.count(it.second.m_alias))
6093 {
6094 auto maxQueueNumber = getNumberOfPortSupportedQueueCounters(it.second.m_alias);
6095 FlexCounterQueueStates flexCounterQueueState(maxQueueNumber);
6096 queuesStateVector.insert(make_pair(it.second.m_alias, flexCounterQueueState));
6097 }
6098 generateQueueMapPerPort(it.second, queuesStateVector.at(it.second.m_alias), true);
6099 }
6100 }
6101
6102 m_isQueueMapGenerated = true;
6103}
6104
6105void PortsOrch::generateQueueMapPerPort(const Port& port, FlexCounterQueueStates& queuesState, bool voq)
6106{
6107 /* Create the Queue map in the Counter DB */
6108 vector<FieldValueTuple> queueVector;
6109 vector<FieldValueTuple> queuePortVector;
6110 vector<FieldValueTuple> queueIndexVector;
6111 vector<FieldValueTuple> queueTypeVector;
6112 std::vector<sai_object_id_t> queue_ids;
6113
6114 if (voq)
6115 {
6116 queue_ids = m_port_voq_ids[port.m_alias];
6117 }
6118 else
6119 {
6120 queue_ids = port.m_queue_ids;
6121 }
6122
6123 for (size_t queueIndex = 0; queueIndex < queue_ids.size(); ++queueIndex)
6124 {
6125 std::ostringstream name;
6126
6127 if (voq)
6128 {
6129 name << port.m_system_port_info.alias << ":" << queueIndex;
6130 }
6131 else
6132 {
6133 name << port.m_alias << ":" << queueIndex;
6134 }
6135
6136 const auto id = sai_serialize_object_id(queue_ids[queueIndex]);
6137
6138 string queueType;
6139 uint8_t queueRealIndex = 0;
6140 if (getQueueTypeAndIndex(queue_ids[queueIndex], queueType, queueRealIndex))
6141 {
6142 /* voq counters are always enabled. There is no mechanism to disable voq
6143 * counters in a voq system. */
6144 if (!voq && !queuesState.isQueueCounterEnabled(queueRealIndex))
6145 {
6146 continue;
6147 }
6148 queueTypeVector.emplace_back(id, queueType);
6149 queueIndexVector.emplace_back(id, to_string(queueRealIndex));
6150 }
6151
6152 queueVector.emplace_back(name.str(), id);
6153 if (voq)
6154 {
6155 queuePortVector.emplace_back(id, sai_serialize_object_id(port.m_system_port_oid));
6156 }
6157 else
6158 {
6159 queuePortVector.emplace_back(id, sai_serialize_object_id(port.m_port_id));
6160 }
6161 }
6162
6163 if (voq)
6164 {
6165 m_voqTable->set("", queueVector);
6166 }
6167 else
6168 {
6169 m_queueTable->set("", queueVector);
6170 }
6171 m_queuePortTable->set("", queuePortVector);
6172 m_queueIndexTable->set("", queueIndexVector);
6173 m_queueTypeTable->set("", queueTypeVector);
6174
6175 CounterCheckOrch::getInstance().addPort(port);
6176}
6177
6178void PortsOrch::addQueueFlexCounters(map<string, FlexCounterQueueStates> queuesStateVector)
6179{
6180 if (m_isQueueFlexCountersAdded)
6181 {
6182 return;
6183 }
6184
6185 for (const auto& it: m_portList)
6186 {
6187 if (it.second.m_type == Port::PHY)
6188 {
6189 if (!queuesStateVector.count(it.second.m_alias))
6190 {
6191 auto maxQueueNumber = getNumberOfPortSupportedQueueCounters(it.second.m_alias);
6192 FlexCounterQueueStates flexCounterQueueState(maxQueueNumber);
6193 queuesStateVector.insert(make_pair(it.second.m_alias, flexCounterQueueState));
6194 }
6195 addQueueFlexCountersPerPort(it.second, queuesStateVector.at(it.second.m_alias));
6196 }
6197 }
6198
6199 m_isQueueFlexCountersAdded = true;
6200}
6201
6202
6203void PortsOrch::addQueueFlexCountersPerPort(const Port& port, FlexCounterQueueStates& queuesState)
6204{
6205 for (size_t queueIndex = 0; queueIndex < port.m_queue_ids.size(); ++queueIndex)
6206 {
6207 string queueType;
6208 uint8_t queueRealIndex = 0;
6209 if (getQueueTypeAndIndex(port.m_queue_ids[queueIndex], queueType, queueRealIndex))
6210 {
6211 if (!queuesState.isQueueCounterEnabled(queueRealIndex))
6212 {
6213 continue;
6214 }
6215 // Install a flex counter for this queue to track stats
6216 addQueueFlexCountersPerPortPerQueueIndex(port, queueIndex);
6217 }
6218 }
6219}
6220
6221void PortsOrch::addQueueFlexCountersPerPortPerQueueIndex(const Port& port, size_t queueIndex)
6222{
6223 std::unordered_set<string> counter_stats;
6224 for (const auto& it: queue_stat_ids)
6225 {
6226 counter_stats.emplace(sai_serialize_queue_stat(it));
6227 }
6228 queue_stat_manager.setCounterIdList(port.m_queue_ids[queueIndex], CounterType::QUEUE, counter_stats);
6229}
6230
6231
6232void PortsOrch::addQueueWatermarkFlexCounters(map<string, FlexCounterQueueStates> queuesStateVector)
6233{
6234 if (m_isQueueWatermarkFlexCountersAdded)
6235 {
6236 return;
6237 }
6238
6239 for (const auto& it: m_portList)
6240 {
6241 if (it.second.m_type == Port::PHY)
6242 {
6243 if (!queuesStateVector.count(it.second.m_alias))
6244 {
6245 auto maxQueueNumber = getNumberOfPortSupportedQueueCounters(it.second.m_alias);
6246 FlexCounterQueueStates flexCounterQueueState(maxQueueNumber);
6247 queuesStateVector.insert(make_pair(it.second.m_alias, flexCounterQueueState));
6248 }
6249 addQueueWatermarkFlexCountersPerPort(it.second, queuesStateVector.at(it.second.m_alias));
6250 }
6251 }
6252
6253 m_isQueueWatermarkFlexCountersAdded = true;
6254}
6255
6256void PortsOrch::addQueueWatermarkFlexCountersPerPort(const Port& port, FlexCounterQueueStates& queuesState)
6257{
6258 /* Add stat counters to flex_counter */
6259
6260 for (size_t queueIndex = 0; queueIndex < port.m_queue_ids.size(); ++queueIndex)
6261 {
6262 string queueType;
6263 uint8_t queueRealIndex = 0;
6264 if (getQueueTypeAndIndex(port.m_queue_ids[queueIndex], queueType, queueRealIndex))
6265 {
6266 if (!queuesState.isQueueCounterEnabled(queueRealIndex))
6267 {
6268 continue;
6269 }
6270 addQueueWatermarkFlexCountersPerPortPerQueueIndex(port, queueIndex);
6271 }
6272 }
6273}
6274
6275void PortsOrch::addQueueWatermarkFlexCountersPerPortPerQueueIndex(const Port& port, size_t queueIndex)
6276{
6277 const auto id = sai_serialize_object_id(port.m_queue_ids[queueIndex]);
6278
6279 /* add watermark queue counters */
6280 string key = getQueueWatermarkFlexCounterTableKey(id);
6281
6282 string delimiter("");
6283 std::ostringstream counters_stream;
6284 for (const auto& it: queueWatermarkStatIds)
6285 {
6286 counters_stream << delimiter << sai_serialize_queue_stat(it);
6287 delimiter = comma;
6288 }
6289
6290 vector<FieldValueTuple> fieldValues;
6291 fieldValues.emplace_back(QUEUE_COUNTER_ID_LIST, counters_stream.str());
6292
6293 m_flexCounterTable->set(key, fieldValues);
6294}
6295
6296void PortsOrch::createPortBufferQueueCounters(const Port &port, string queues)
6297{
6298 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
6299
6300 /* Create the Queue map in the Counter DB */
6301 vector<FieldValueTuple> queueVector;
6302 vector<FieldValueTuple> queuePortVector;
6303 vector<FieldValueTuple> queueIndexVector;
6304 vector<FieldValueTuple> queueTypeVector;
6305
6306 auto toks = tokenize(queues, '-');
6307 auto startIndex = to_uint<uint32_t>(toks[0]);
6308 auto endIndex = startIndex;
6309 if (toks.size() > 1)
6310 {
6311 endIndex = to_uint<uint32_t>(toks[1]);
6312 }
6313
6314 for (auto queueIndex = startIndex; queueIndex <= endIndex; queueIndex++)
6315 {
6316 std::ostringstream name;
6317 name << port.m_alias << ":" << queueIndex;
6318
6319 const auto id = sai_serialize_object_id(port.m_queue_ids[queueIndex]);
6320
6321 string queueType;
6322 uint8_t queueRealIndex = 0;
6323 if (getQueueTypeAndIndex(port.m_queue_ids[queueIndex], queueType, queueRealIndex))
6324 {
6325 queueTypeVector.emplace_back(id, queueType);
6326 queueIndexVector.emplace_back(id, to_string(queueRealIndex));
6327 }
6328
6329 queueVector.emplace_back(name.str(), id);
6330 queuePortVector.emplace_back(id, sai_serialize_object_id(port.m_port_id));
6331
6332 auto flexCounterOrch = gDirectory.get<FlexCounterOrch*>();
6333 if (flexCounterOrch->getQueueCountersState())
6334 {
6335 // Install a flex counter for this queue to track stats
6336 addQueueFlexCountersPerPortPerQueueIndex(port, queueIndex);
6337 }
6338 if (flexCounterOrch->getQueueWatermarkCountersState())
6339 {
6340 /* add watermark queue counters */
6341 addQueueWatermarkFlexCountersPerPortPerQueueIndex(port, queueIndex);
6342 }
6343 }
6344
6345 m_queueTable->set("", queueVector);
6346 m_queuePortTable->set("", queuePortVector);
6347 m_queueIndexTable->set("", queueIndexVector);
6348 m_queueTypeTable->set("", queueTypeVector);
6349
6350 CounterCheckOrch::getInstance().addPort(port);
6351}
6352
6353void PortsOrch::removePortBufferQueueCounters(const Port &port, string queues)
6354{
6355 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
6356
6357 /* Remove the Queues maps in the Counter DB */
6358 /* Remove stat counters from flex_counter DB */
6359 auto toks = tokenize(queues, '-');
6360 auto startIndex = to_uint<uint32_t>(toks[0]);
6361 auto endIndex = startIndex;
6362 if (toks.size() > 1)
6363 {
6364 endIndex = to_uint<uint32_t>(toks[1]);
6365 }
6366
6367 for (auto queueIndex = startIndex; queueIndex <= endIndex; queueIndex++)
6368 {
6369 std::ostringstream name;
6370 name << port.m_alias << ":" << queueIndex;
6371 const auto id = sai_serialize_object_id(port.m_queue_ids[queueIndex]);
6372
6373 // Remove the queue counter from counters DB maps
6374 m_queueTable->hdel("", name.str());
6375 m_queuePortTable->hdel("", id);
6376
6377 string queueType;
6378 uint8_t queueRealIndex = 0;
6379 if (getQueueTypeAndIndex(port.m_queue_ids[queueIndex], queueType, queueRealIndex))
6380 {
6381 m_queueTypeTable->hdel("", id);
6382 m_queueIndexTable->hdel("", id);
6383 }
6384
6385 auto flexCounterOrch = gDirectory.get<FlexCounterOrch*>();
6386 if (flexCounterOrch->getQueueCountersState())
6387 {
6388 // Remove the flex counter for this queue
6389 queue_stat_manager.clearCounterIdList(port.m_queue_ids[queueIndex]);
6390 }
6391
6392 if (flexCounterOrch->getQueueWatermarkCountersState())
6393 {
6394 // Remove watermark queue counters
6395 string key = getQueueWatermarkFlexCounterTableKey(id);
6396 m_flexCounterTable->del(key);
6397 }
6398 }
6399
6400 CounterCheckOrch::getInstance().removePort(port);
6401}
6402
6403void PortsOrch::generatePriorityGroupMap(map<string, FlexCounterPgStates> pgsStateVector)
6404{
6405 if (m_isPriorityGroupMapGenerated)
6406 {
6407 return;
6408 }
6409
6410 for (const auto& it: m_portList)
6411 {
6412 if (it.second.m_type == Port::PHY)
6413 {
6414 if (!pgsStateVector.count(it.second.m_alias))
6415 {
6416 auto maxPgNumber = getNumberOfPortSupportedPgCounters(it.second.m_alias);
6417 FlexCounterPgStates flexCounterPgState(maxPgNumber);
6418 pgsStateVector.insert(make_pair(it.second.m_alias, flexCounterPgState));
6419 }
6420 generatePriorityGroupMapPerPort(it.second, pgsStateVector.at(it.second.m_alias));
6421 }
6422 }
6423
6424 m_isPriorityGroupMapGenerated = true;
6425}
6426
6427void PortsOrch::generatePriorityGroupMapPerPort(const Port& port, FlexCounterPgStates& pgsState)
6428{
6429 /* Create the PG map in the Counter DB */
6430 vector<FieldValueTuple> pgVector;
6431 vector<FieldValueTuple> pgPortVector;
6432 vector<FieldValueTuple> pgIndexVector;
6433
6434 for (size_t pgIndex = 0; pgIndex < port.m_priority_group_ids.size(); ++pgIndex)
6435 {
6436 if (!pgsState.isPgCounterEnabled(static_cast<uint32_t>(pgIndex)))
6437 {
6438 continue;
6439 }
6440 std::ostringstream name;
6441 name << port.m_alias << ":" << pgIndex;
6442
6443 const auto id = sai_serialize_object_id(port.m_priority_group_ids[pgIndex]);
6444
6445 pgVector.emplace_back(name.str(), id);
6446 pgPortVector.emplace_back(id, sai_serialize_object_id(port.m_port_id));
6447 pgIndexVector.emplace_back(id, to_string(pgIndex));
6448
6449 }
6450
6451 m_pgTable->set("", pgVector);
6452 m_pgPortTable->set("", pgPortVector);
6453 m_pgIndexTable->set("", pgIndexVector);
6454
6455 CounterCheckOrch::getInstance().addPort(port);
6456}
6457
6458void PortsOrch::createPortBufferPgCounters(const Port& port, string pgs)
6459{
6460 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
6461
6462 /* Create the PG map in the Counter DB */
6463 /* Add stat counters to flex_counter */
6464 vector<FieldValueTuple> pgVector;
6465 vector<FieldValueTuple> pgPortVector;
6466 vector<FieldValueTuple> pgIndexVector;
6467
6468 auto toks = tokenize(pgs, '-');
6469 auto startIndex = to_uint<uint32_t>(toks[0]);
6470 auto endIndex = startIndex;
6471 if (toks.size() > 1)
6472 {
6473 endIndex = to_uint<uint32_t>(toks[1]);
6474 }
6475
6476 for (auto pgIndex = startIndex; pgIndex <= endIndex; pgIndex++)
6477 {
6478 std::ostringstream name;
6479 name << port.m_alias << ":" << pgIndex;
6480
6481 const auto id = sai_serialize_object_id(port.m_priority_group_ids[pgIndex]);
6482
6483 pgVector.emplace_back(name.str(), id);
6484 pgPortVector.emplace_back(id, sai_serialize_object_id(port.m_port_id));
6485 pgIndexVector.emplace_back(id, to_string(pgIndex));
6486
6487 auto flexCounterOrch = gDirectory.get<FlexCounterOrch*>();
6488 if (flexCounterOrch->getPgCountersState())
6489 {
6490 /* Add dropped packets counters to flex_counter */
6491 addPriorityGroupFlexCountersPerPortPerPgIndex(port, pgIndex);
6492 }
6493 if (flexCounterOrch->getPgWatermarkCountersState())
6494 {
6495 /* Add watermark counters to flex_counter */
6496 addPriorityGroupWatermarkFlexCountersPerPortPerPgIndex(port, pgIndex);
6497 }
6498 }
6499
6500 m_pgTable->set("", pgVector);
6501 m_pgPortTable->set("", pgPortVector);
6502 m_pgIndexTable->set("", pgIndexVector);
6503
6504 CounterCheckOrch::getInstance().addPort(port);
6505}
6506
6507void PortsOrch::addPriorityGroupFlexCounters(map<string, FlexCounterPgStates> pgsStateVector)
6508{
6509 if (m_isPriorityGroupFlexCountersAdded)
6510 {
6511 return;
6512 }
6513
6514 for (const auto& it: m_portList)
6515 {
6516 if (it.second.m_type == Port::PHY)
6517 {
6518 if (!pgsStateVector.count(it.second.m_alias))
6519 {
6520 auto maxPgNumber = getNumberOfPortSupportedPgCounters(it.second.m_alias);
6521 FlexCounterPgStates flexCounterPgState(maxPgNumber);
6522 pgsStateVector.insert(make_pair(it.second.m_alias, flexCounterPgState));
6523 }
6524 addPriorityGroupFlexCountersPerPort(it.second, pgsStateVector.at(it.second.m_alias));
6525 }
6526 }
6527
6528 m_isPriorityGroupFlexCountersAdded = true;
6529}
6530
6531void PortsOrch::addPriorityGroupFlexCountersPerPort(const Port& port, FlexCounterPgStates& pgsState)
6532{
6533 for (size_t pgIndex = 0; pgIndex < port.m_priority_group_ids.size(); ++pgIndex)
6534 {
6535 if (!pgsState.isPgCounterEnabled(static_cast<uint32_t>(pgIndex)))
6536 {
6537 continue;
6538 }
6539 addPriorityGroupFlexCountersPerPortPerPgIndex(port, pgIndex);
6540 }
6541}
6542
6543void PortsOrch::addPriorityGroupFlexCountersPerPortPerPgIndex(const Port& port, size_t pgIndex)
6544{
6545 const auto id = sai_serialize_object_id(port.m_priority_group_ids[pgIndex]);
6546
6547 string delimiter = "";
6548 std::ostringstream ingress_pg_drop_packets_counters_stream;
6549 string key = getPriorityGroupDropPacketsFlexCounterTableKey(id);
6550 /* Add dropped packets counters to flex_counter */
6551 for (const auto& it: ingressPriorityGroupDropStatIds)
6552 {
6553 ingress_pg_drop_packets_counters_stream << delimiter << sai_serialize_ingress_priority_group_stat(it);
6554 if (delimiter.empty())
6555 {
6556 delimiter = comma;
6557 }
6558 }
6559 vector<FieldValueTuple> fieldValues;
6560 fieldValues.emplace_back(PG_COUNTER_ID_LIST, ingress_pg_drop_packets_counters_stream.str());
6561 m_flexCounterTable->set(key, fieldValues);
6562}
6563
6564void PortsOrch::addPriorityGroupWatermarkFlexCounters(map<string, FlexCounterPgStates> pgsStateVector)
6565{
6566 if (m_isPriorityGroupWatermarkFlexCountersAdded)
6567 {
6568 return;
6569 }
6570
6571 for (const auto& it: m_portList)
6572 {
6573 if (it.second.m_type == Port::PHY)
6574 {
6575 if (!pgsStateVector.count(it.second.m_alias))
6576 {
6577 auto maxPgNumber = getNumberOfPortSupportedPgCounters(it.second.m_alias);
6578 FlexCounterPgStates flexCounterPgState(maxPgNumber);
6579 pgsStateVector.insert(make_pair(it.second.m_alias, flexCounterPgState));
6580 }
6581 addPriorityGroupWatermarkFlexCountersPerPort(it.second, pgsStateVector.at(it.second.m_alias));
6582 }
6583 }
6584
6585 m_isPriorityGroupWatermarkFlexCountersAdded = true;
6586}
6587
6588void PortsOrch::addPriorityGroupWatermarkFlexCountersPerPort(const Port& port, FlexCounterPgStates& pgsState)
6589{
6590 /* Add stat counters to flex_counter */
6591
6592 for (size_t pgIndex = 0; pgIndex < port.m_priority_group_ids.size(); ++pgIndex)
6593 {
6594 if (!pgsState.isPgCounterEnabled(static_cast<uint32_t>(pgIndex)))
6595 {
6596 continue;
6597 }
6598 addPriorityGroupWatermarkFlexCountersPerPortPerPgIndex(port, pgIndex);
6599 }
6600}
6601
6602void PortsOrch::addPriorityGroupWatermarkFlexCountersPerPortPerPgIndex(const Port& port, size_t pgIndex)
6603{
6604 const auto id = sai_serialize_object_id(port.m_priority_group_ids[pgIndex]);
6605
6606 string key = getPriorityGroupWatermarkFlexCounterTableKey(id);
6607
6608 std::string delimiter = "";
6609 std::ostringstream counters_stream;
6610 /* Add watermark counters to flex_counter */
6611 for (const auto& it: ingressPriorityGroupWatermarkStatIds)
6612 {
6613 counters_stream << delimiter << sai_serialize_ingress_priority_group_stat(it);
6614 delimiter = comma;
6615 }
6616
6617 vector<FieldValueTuple> fieldValues;
6618 fieldValues.emplace_back(PG_COUNTER_ID_LIST, counters_stream.str());
6619 m_flexCounterTable->set(key, fieldValues);
6620}
6621
6622void PortsOrch::removePortBufferPgCounters(const Port& port, string pgs)
6623{
6624 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
6625
6626 /* Remove the Pgs maps in the Counter DB */
6627 /* Remove stat counters from flex_counter DB */
6628 auto toks = tokenize(pgs, '-');
6629 auto startIndex = to_uint<uint32_t>(toks[0]);
6630 auto endIndex = startIndex;
6631 if (toks.size() > 1)
6632 {
6633 endIndex = to_uint<uint32_t>(toks[1]);
6634 }
6635
6636 for (auto pgIndex = startIndex; pgIndex <= endIndex; pgIndex++)
6637 {
6638 std::ostringstream name;
6639 name << port.m_alias << ":" << pgIndex;
6640 const auto id = sai_serialize_object_id(port.m_priority_group_ids[pgIndex]);
6641
6642 // Remove the pg counter from counters DB maps
6643 m_pgTable->hdel("", name.str());
6644 m_pgPortTable->hdel("", id);
6645 m_pgIndexTable->hdel("", id);
6646
6647 auto flexCounterOrch = gDirectory.get<FlexCounterOrch*>();
6648 if (flexCounterOrch->getPgCountersState())
6649 {
6650 // Remove dropped packets counters from flex_counter
6651 string key = getPriorityGroupDropPacketsFlexCounterTableKey(id);
6652 m_flexCounterTable->del(key);
6653 }
6654
6655 if (flexCounterOrch->getPgWatermarkCountersState())
6656 {
6657 // Remove watermark counters from flex_counter
6658 string key = getPriorityGroupWatermarkFlexCounterTableKey(id);
6659 m_flexCounterTable->del(key);
6660 }
6661 }
6662
6663 CounterCheckOrch::getInstance().removePort(port);
6664}
6665
6666void PortsOrch::generatePortCounterMap()
6667{
6668 if (m_isPortCounterMapGenerated)
6669 {
6670 return;
6671 }
6672
6673 auto port_counter_stats = generateCounterStats(PORT_STAT_COUNTER_FLEX_COUNTER_GROUP);
6674 auto gbport_counter_stats = generateCounterStats(PORT_STAT_COUNTER_FLEX_COUNTER_GROUP, true);
6675 for (const auto& it: m_portList)
6676 {
6677 // Set counter stats only for PHY ports to ensure syncd will not try to query the counter statistics from the HW for non-PHY ports.
6678 if (it.second.m_type != Port::Type::PHY)
6679 {
6680 continue;
6681 }
6682 port_stat_manager.setCounterIdList(it.second.m_port_id,
6683 CounterType::PORT, port_counter_stats);
6684 if (it.second.m_system_side_id)
6685 gb_port_stat_manager.setCounterIdList(it.second.m_system_side_id,
6686 CounterType::PORT, gbport_counter_stats);
6687 if (it.second.m_line_side_id)
6688 gb_port_stat_manager.setCounterIdList(it.second.m_line_side_id,
6689 CounterType::PORT, gbport_counter_stats);
6690 }
6691
6692 m_isPortCounterMapGenerated = true;
6693}
6694
6695void PortsOrch::generatePortBufferDropCounterMap()
6696{
6697 if (m_isPortBufferDropCounterMapGenerated)
6698 {
6699 return;
6700 }
6701
6702 auto port_buffer_drop_stats = generateCounterStats(PORT_BUFFER_DROP_STAT_FLEX_COUNTER_GROUP);
6703 for (const auto& it: m_portList)
6704 {
6705 // Set counter stats only for PHY ports to ensure syncd will not try to query the counter statistics from the HW for non-PHY ports.
6706 if (it.second.m_type != Port::Type::PHY)
6707 {
6708 continue;
6709 }
6710 port_buffer_drop_stat_manager.setCounterIdList(it.second.m_port_id, CounterType::PORT, port_buffer_drop_stats);
6711 }
6712
6713 m_isPortBufferDropCounterMapGenerated = true;
6714}
6715
6716uint32_t PortsOrch::getNumberOfPortSupportedPgCounters(string port)
6717{
6718 return static_cast<uint32_t>(m_portList[port].m_priority_group_ids.size());
6719}
6720
6721uint32_t PortsOrch::getNumberOfPortSupportedQueueCounters(string port)
6722{
6723 return static_cast<uint32_t>(m_portList[port].m_queue_ids.size());
6724}
6725
6726void PortsOrch::doTask(NotificationConsumer &consumer)
6727{
6728 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
6729
6730 /* Wait for all ports to be initialized */
6731 if (!allPortsReady())
6732 {
6733 return;
6734 }
6735
6736 std::string op;
6737 std::string data;
6738 std::vector<swss::FieldValueTuple> values;
6739
6740 consumer.pop(op, data, values);
6741
6742 if (&consumer != m_portStatusNotificationConsumer)
6743 {
6744 return;
6745 }
6746
6747 if (op == "port_state_change")
6748 {
6749 uint32_t count;
6750 sai_port_oper_status_notification_t *portoperstatus = nullptr;
6751
6752 sai_deserialize_port_oper_status_ntf(data, count, &portoperstatus);
6753
6754 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < count; i++)
6755 {
6756 sai_object_id_t id = portoperstatus[i].port_id;
6757 sai_port_oper_status_t status = portoperstatus[i].port_state;
6758
6759 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Get port state change notification id:%" PRIx64 " status:%d", id, status);
6760
6761 Port port;
6762
6763 if (!getPort(id, port))
6764 {
6765 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Got port state change for port id 0x%" PRIx64 " which does not exist, possibly outdated event", id);
6766 continue;
6767 }
6768
6769 updatePortOperStatus(port, status);
6770 if (status == SAI_PORT_OPER_STATUS_UP)
6771 {
6772 sai_uint32_t speed;
6773 if (getPortOperSpeed(port, speed))
6774 {
6775 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("%s oper speed is %d", port.m_alias.c_str(), speed);
6776 updateDbPortOperSpeed(port, speed);
6777 }
6778 else
6779 {
6780 updateDbPortOperSpeed(port, 0);
6781 }
6782 }
6783
6784 /* update m_portList */
6785 m_portList[port.m_alias] = port;
6786 }
6787
6788 sai_deserialize_free_port_oper_status_ntf(count, portoperstatus);
6789 }
6790}
6791
6792void PortsOrch::updatePortOperStatus(Port &port, sai_port_oper_status_t status)
6793{
6794 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Port %s oper state set from %s to %s",
6795 port.m_alias.c_str(), oper_status_strings.at(port.m_oper_status).c_str(),
6796 oper_status_strings.at(status).c_str());
6797 if (status == port.m_oper_status)
6798 {
6799 return;
6800 }
6801
6802 if (port.m_type == Port::PHY)
6803 {
6804 updateDbPortOperStatus(port, status);
6805 updateGearboxPortOperStatus(port);
6806
6807 /* Refresh the port states and reschedule the poller tasks */
6808 if (port.m_autoneg > 0)
6809 {
6810 refreshPortStateAutoNeg(port);
6811 updatePortStatePoll(port, PORT_STATE_POLL_AN, !(status == SAI_PORT_OPER_STATUS_UP));
6812 }
6813 if (port.m_link_training > 0)
6814 {
6815 refreshPortStateLinkTraining(port);
6816 updatePortStatePoll(port, PORT_STATE_POLL_LT, !(status == SAI_PORT_OPER_STATUS_UP));
6817 }
6818 }
6819 port.m_oper_status = status;
6820
6821 if(port.m_type == Port::TUNNEL)
6822 {
6823 return;
6824 }
6825
6826 bool isUp = status == SAI_PORT_OPER_STATUS_UP;
6827 if (port.m_type == Port::PHY)
6828 {
6829 if (!setHostIntfsOperStatus(port, isUp))
6830 {
6831 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set host interface %s operational status %s", port.m_alias.c_str(),
6832 isUp ? "up" : "down");
6833 }
6834 }
6835 if (!gNeighOrch->ifChangeInformNextHop(port.m_alias, isUp))
6836 {
6837 SWSS_LOG_WARN("Inform nexthop operation failed for interface %s", port.m_alias.c_str());
6838 }
6839 for (const auto &child_port : port.m_child_ports)
6840 {
6841 if (!gNeighOrch->ifChangeInformNextHop(child_port, isUp))
6842 {
6843 SWSS_LOG_WARN("Inform nexthop operation failed for sub interface %s", child_port.c_str());
6844 }
6845 }
6846
6847 PortOperStateUpdate update = {port, status};
6848 notify(SUBJECT_TYPE_PORT_OPER_STATE_CHANGE, static_cast<void *>(&update));
6849}
6850
6851void PortsOrch::updateDbPortOperSpeed(Port &port, sai_uint32_t speed)
6852{
6853 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
6854
6855 vector<FieldValueTuple> tuples;
6856 string speedStr = speed != 0 ? to_string(speed) : "N/A";
6857 tuples.emplace_back(std::make_pair("speed", speedStr));
6858 m_portStateTable.set(port.m_alias, tuples);
6859
6860 // We don't set port.m_speed = speed here, because CONFIG_DB still hold the old
6861 // value. If we set it here, next time configure any attributes related port will
6862 // cause a port flapping.
6863}
6864
6865/*
6866 * sync up orchagent with libsai/ASIC for port state.
6867 *
6868 * Currently NotificationProducer is used by syncd to inform port state change,
6869 * which means orchagent will miss the signal if it happens between orchagent shutdown and startup.
6870 * Syncd doesn't know whether the signal has been lost or not.
6871 * Also the source of notification event is from libsai/SDK.
6872 *
6873 * Latest oper status for each port is retrieved via SAI_PORT_ATTR_OPER_STATUS sai API,
6874 * the hostif and db are updated accordingly.
6875 */
6876void PortsOrch::refreshPortStatus()
6877{
6878 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
6879
6880 for (auto &it: m_portList)
6881 {
6882 auto &port = it.second;
6883 if (port.m_type != Port::PHY)
6884 {
6885 continue;
6886 }
6887
6888 sai_port_oper_status_t status;
6889 if (!getPortOperStatus(port, status))
6890 {
6891 throw runtime_error("PortsOrch get port oper status failure");
6892 }
6893
6894 SWSS_LOG_INFO("%s oper status is %s", port.m_alias.c_str(), oper_status_strings.at(status).c_str());
6895 updatePortOperStatus(port, status);
6896
6897 if (status == SAI_PORT_OPER_STATUS_UP)
6898 {
6899 sai_uint32_t speed;
6900 if (getPortOperSpeed(port, speed))
6901 {
6902 SWSS_LOG_INFO("%s oper speed is %d", port.m_alias.c_str(), speed);
6903 updateDbPortOperSpeed(port, speed);
6904 }
6905 else
6906 {
6907 updateDbPortOperSpeed(port, 0);
6908 }
6909 }
6910 }
6911}
6912
6913bool PortsOrch::getPortOperStatus(const Port& port, sai_port_oper_status_t& status) const
6914{
6915 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
6916
6917 if (port.m_type != Port::PHY)
6918 {
6919 return false;
6920 }
6921
6922 sai_attribute_t attr;
6923 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_OPER_STATUS;
6924
6925 sai_status_t ret = sai_port_api->get_port_attribute(port.m_port_id, 1, &attr);
6926 if (ret != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
6927 {
6928 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get oper_status for %s", port.m_alias.c_str());
6929 return false;
6930 }
6931
6932 status = static_cast<sai_port_oper_status_t>(attr.value.u32);
6933
6934 return true;
6935}
6936
6937bool PortsOrch::getPortOperSpeed(const Port& port, sai_uint32_t& speed) const
6938{
6939 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
6940
6941 if (port.m_type != Port::PHY)
6942 {
6943 return false;
6944 }
6945
6946 sai_attribute_t attr;
6947 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_OPER_SPEED;
6948
6949 sai_status_t ret = sai_port_api->get_port_attribute(port.m_port_id, 1, &attr);
6950 if (ret != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
6951 {
6952 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get oper speed for %s", port.m_alias.c_str());
6953 return false;
6954 }
6955
6956 speed = static_cast<sai_uint32_t>(attr.value.u32);
6957
6958 if (speed == 0)
6959 {
6960 // Port operational status is up, but operational speed is 0. It could be a valid case because
6961 // port state can change during two SAI calls:
6962 // 1. getPortOperStatus returns UP
6963 // 2. port goes down due to any reason
6964 // 3. getPortOperSpeed gets speed value 0
6965 // And it could also be a bug. So, we log a warning here.
6966 SWSS_LOG_WARN("Port %s operational speed is 0", port.m_alias.c_str());
6967 return false;
6968 }
6969
6970 return true;
6971}
6972
6973bool PortsOrch::getPortLinkTrainingRxStatus(const Port &port, sai_port_link_training_rx_status_t &rx_status)
6974{
6975 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
6976
6977 if (port.m_type != Port::PHY)
6978 {
6979 return false;
6980 }
6981
6982 sai_attribute_t attr;
6983 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_LINK_TRAINING_RX_STATUS;
6984 sai_status_t ret = sai_port_api->get_port_attribute(port.m_port_id, 1, &attr);
6985 if (ret != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
6986 {
6987 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get LT rx status for %s", port.m_alias.c_str());
6988 return false;
6989 }
6990
6991 rx_status = static_cast<sai_port_link_training_rx_status_t>(attr.value.u32);
6992 return true;
6993}
6994
6995bool PortsOrch::getPortLinkTrainingFailure(const Port &port, sai_port_link_training_failure_status_t &failure)
6996{
6997 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
6998
6999 if (port.m_type != Port::PHY)
7000 {
7001 return false;
7002 }
7003
7004 sai_attribute_t attr;
7005 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_LINK_TRAINING_FAILURE_STATUS;
7006 sai_status_t ret = sai_port_api->get_port_attribute(port.m_port_id, 1, &attr);
7007 if (ret != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
7008 {
7009 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get LT failure status for %s", port.m_alias.c_str());
7010 return false;
7011 }
7012
7013 failure = static_cast<sai_port_link_training_failure_status_t>(attr.value.u32);
7014 return true;
7015}
7016
7017bool PortsOrch::getSaiAclBindPointType(Port::Type type,
7018 sai_acl_bind_point_type_t &sai_acl_bind_type)
7019{
7020 switch(type)
7021 {
7022 case Port::PHY:
7023 sai_acl_bind_type = SAI_ACL_BIND_POINT_TYPE_PORT;
7024 break;
7025 case Port::LAG:
7026 sai_acl_bind_type = SAI_ACL_BIND_POINT_TYPE_LAG;
7027 break;
7028 case Port::VLAN:
7029 sai_acl_bind_type = SAI_ACL_BIND_POINT_TYPE_VLAN;
7030 break;
7031 default:
7032 // Dealing with port, lag and vlan for now.
7033 return false;
7034 }
7035 return true;
7036}
7037
7038bool PortsOrch::removeAclTableGroup(const Port &p)
7039{
7040 sai_acl_bind_point_type_t bind_type;
7041 if (!getSaiAclBindPointType(p.m_type, bind_type))
7042 {
7043 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Unknown SAI ACL bind point type");
7044 return false;
7045 }
7046
7047 sai_status_t ret;
7048 if (p.m_ingress_acl_table_group_id != 0)
7049 {
7050 ret = sai_acl_api->remove_acl_table_group(p.m_ingress_acl_table_group_id);
7051 if (ret != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
7052 {
7053 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to remove ingress acl table group for %s", p.m_alias.c_str());
7054 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiRemoveStatus(SAI_API_ACL, ret);
7055 if (handle_status != task_success)
7056 {
7057 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
7058 }
7059 }
7060 gCrmOrch->decCrmAclUsedCounter(CrmResourceType::CRM_ACL_GROUP, SAI_ACL_STAGE_INGRESS, bind_type, p.m_ingress_acl_table_group_id);
7061 }
7062
7063 if (p.m_egress_acl_table_group_id != 0)
7064 {
7065 ret = sai_acl_api->remove_acl_table_group(p.m_egress_acl_table_group_id);
7066 if (ret != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
7067 {
7068 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to remove egress acl table group for %s", p.m_alias.c_str());
7069 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiRemoveStatus(SAI_API_ACL, ret);
7070 if (handle_status != task_success)
7071 {
7072 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
7073 }
7074 }
7075 gCrmOrch->decCrmAclUsedCounter(CrmResourceType::CRM_ACL_GROUP, SAI_ACL_STAGE_EGRESS, bind_type, p.m_egress_acl_table_group_id);
7076 }
7077 return true;
7078}
7079
7080bool PortsOrch::setPortSerdesAttribute(sai_object_id_t port_id, sai_object_id_t switch_id,
7081 map<sai_port_serdes_attr_t, vector<uint32_t>> &serdes_attr)
7082{
7083 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
7084
7085 vector<sai_attribute_t> attr_list;
7086 sai_attribute_t port_attr;
7087 sai_attribute_t port_serdes_attr;
7088 sai_status_t status;
7089 sai_object_id_t port_serdes_id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID;
7090
7091 port_attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_PORT_SERDES_ID;
7092 status = sai_port_api->get_port_attribute(port_id, 1, &port_attr);
7093 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
7094 {
7095 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get port attr serdes id %d to port pid:0x%" PRIx64,
7096 port_attr.id, port_id);
7097 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiGetStatus(SAI_API_PORT, status);
7098 if (handle_status != task_process_status::task_success)
7099 {
7100 return false;
7101 }
7102 }
7103
7104 if (port_attr.value.oid != SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID)
7105 {
7106 status = sai_port_api->remove_port_serdes(port_attr.value.oid);
7107 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
7108 {
7109 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to remove existing port serdes attr 0x%" PRIx64 " port 0x%" PRIx64,
7110 port_attr.value.oid, port_id);
7111 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiRemoveStatus(SAI_API_PORT, status);
7112 if (handle_status != task_success)
7113 {
7114 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
7115 }
7116 }
7117 }
7118
7119
7120 port_serdes_attr.id = SAI_PORT_SERDES_ATTR_PORT_ID;
7121 port_serdes_attr.value.oid = port_id;
7122 attr_list.emplace_back(port_serdes_attr);
7123 SWSS_LOG_INFO("Creating serdes for port 0x%" PRIx64, port_id);
7124
7125 for (auto it = serdes_attr.begin(); it != serdes_attr.end(); it++)
7126 {
7127 port_serdes_attr.id = it->first;
7128 port_serdes_attr.value.u32list.count = (uint32_t)it->second.size();
7129 port_serdes_attr.value.u32list.list = it->second.data();
7130 attr_list.emplace_back(port_serdes_attr);
7131 }
7132 status = sai_port_api->create_port_serdes(&port_serdes_id, switch_id,
7133 static_cast<uint32_t>(serdes_attr.size()+1),
7134 attr_list.data());
7135
7136 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
7137 {
7138 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to create port serdes for port 0x%" PRIx64,
7139 port_id);
7140 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiCreateStatus(SAI_API_PORT, status);
7141 if (handle_status != task_success)
7142 {
7143 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
7144 }
7145 }
7146 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Created port serdes object 0x%" PRIx64 " for port 0x%" PRIx64, port_serdes_id, port_id);
7147 return true;
7148}
7149
7150void PortsOrch::removePortSerdesAttribute(sai_object_id_t port_id)
7151{
7152 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
7153
7154 sai_attribute_t port_attr;
7155 sai_status_t status;
7156 sai_object_id_t port_serdes_id = SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID;
7157
7158 port_attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_PORT_SERDES_ID;
7159 status = sai_port_api->get_port_attribute(port_id, 1, &port_attr);
7160
7161 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
7162 {
7163 SWSS_LOG_DEBUG("Failed to get port attr serdes id %d to port pid:0x%" PRIx64,
7164 port_attr.id, port_id);
7165 return;
7166 }
7167
7168 if (port_attr.value.oid != SAI_NULL_OBJECT_ID)
7169 {
7170 status = sai_port_api->remove_port_serdes(port_attr.value.oid);
7171 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
7172 {
7173 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to remove existing port serdes attr 0x%" PRIx64 " port 0x%" PRIx64,
7174 port_attr.value.oid, port_id);
7175 handleSaiRemoveStatus(SAI_API_PORT, status);
7176 return;
7177 }
7178 }
7179 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Removed port serdes object 0x%" PRIx64 " for port 0x%" PRIx64, port_serdes_id, port_id);
7180}
7181
7182void PortsOrch::getPortSerdesVal(const std::string& val_str,
7183 std::vector<uint32_t> &lane_values,
7184 int base)
7185{
7186 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
7187
7188 uint32_t lane_val;
7189 std::string lane_str;
7190 std::istringstream iss(val_str);
7191
7192 while (std::getline(iss, lane_str, ','))
7193 {
7194 lane_val = (uint32_t)std::stoul(lane_str, NULL, base);
7195 lane_values.push_back(lane_val);
7196 }
7197}
7198
7199bool PortsOrch::getPortAdvSpeedsVal(const std::string &val_str,
7200 std::vector<uint32_t> &speed_values)
7201{
7202 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
7203
7204 if (val_str == "all")
7205 {
7206 return true;
7207 }
7208
7209 uint32_t speed_val;
7210 std::string speed_str;
7211 std::istringstream iss(val_str);
7212
7213 try
7214 {
7215 while (std::getline(iss, speed_str, ','))
7216 {
7217 speed_val = (uint32_t)std::stoul(speed_str);
7218 speed_values.push_back(speed_val);
7219 }
7220 }
7221 catch (const std::invalid_argument &e)
7222 {
7223 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to parse adv_speeds value: %s", val_str.c_str());
7224 return false;
7225 }
7226 std::sort(speed_values.begin(), speed_values.end());
7227 return true;
7228}
7229
7230bool PortsOrch::getPortInterfaceTypeVal(const std::string &s,
7231 sai_port_interface_type_t &interface_type)
7232{
7233 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
7234
7235 auto iter = interface_type_map_for_an.find(s);
7236 if (iter != interface_type_map_for_an.end())
7237 {
7238 interface_type = interface_type_map_for_an[s];
7239 return true;
7240 }
7241 else
7242 {
7243 const std::string &validInterfaceTypes = getValidInterfaceTypes();
7244 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to parse interface_type value %s, valid interface type includes: %s",
7245 s.c_str(), validInterfaceTypes.c_str());
7246 return false;
7247 }
7248}
7249
7250bool PortsOrch::getPortAdvInterfaceTypesVal(const std::string &val_str,
7251 std::vector<uint32_t> &type_values)
7252{
7253 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
7254 if (val_str == "all")
7255 {
7256 return true;
7257 }
7258
7259 sai_port_interface_type_t interface_type ;
7260 std::string type_str;
7261 std::istringstream iss(val_str);
7262 bool valid;
7263
7264 while (std::getline(iss, type_str, ','))
7265 {
7266 valid = getPortInterfaceTypeVal(type_str, interface_type);
7267 if (!valid) {
7268 const std::string &validInterfaceTypes = getValidInterfaceTypes();
7269 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to parse adv_interface_types value %s, valid interface type includes: %s",
7270 val_str.c_str(), validInterfaceTypes.c_str());
7271 return false;
7272 }
7273 type_values.push_back(static_cast<uint32_t>(interface_type));
7274 }
7275 std::sort(type_values.begin(), type_values.end());
7276 return true;
7277}
7278
7279/* Bring up/down Vlan interface associated with L3 VNI*/
7280bool PortsOrch::updateL3VniStatus(uint16_t vlan_id, bool isUp)
7281{
7282 Port vlan;
7283 string vlan_alias;
7284
7285 vlan_alias = VLAN_PREFIX + to_string(vlan_id);
7286 SWSS_LOG_INFO("update L3Vni Status for Vlan %d with isUp %d vlan %s",
7287 vlan_id, isUp, vlan_alias.c_str());
7288
7289 if (!getPort(vlan_alias, vlan))
7290 {
7291 SWSS_LOG_INFO("Failed to locate VLAN %d", vlan_id);
7292 return false;
7293 }
7294
7295 SWSS_LOG_INFO("member count %d, l3vni %d", vlan.m_up_member_count, vlan.m_l3_vni);
7296 if (isUp) {
7297 auto old_count = vlan.m_up_member_count;
7298 vlan.m_up_member_count++;
7299 if (old_count == 0)
7300 {
7301 /* updateVlanOperStatus(vlan, true); */ /* TBD */
7302 vlan.m_oper_status = SAI_PORT_OPER_STATUS_UP;
7303 }
7304 vlan.m_l3_vni = true;
7305 } else {
7306 vlan.m_up_member_count--;
7307 if (vlan.m_up_member_count == 0)
7308 {
7309 /* updateVlanOperStatus(vlan, false); */ /* TBD */
7310 vlan.m_oper_status = SAI_PORT_OPER_STATUS_DOWN;
7311 }
7312 vlan.m_l3_vni = false;
7313 }
7314
7315 m_portList[vlan_alias] = vlan;
7316
7317 SWSS_LOG_INFO("Updated L3Vni status of VLAN %d member count %d", vlan_id, vlan.m_up_member_count);
7318
7319 return true;
7320}
7321
7322/*
7323 * If Gearbox is enabled (wait for GearboxConfigDone),
7324 * then initialize global storage maps
7325 */
7326void PortsOrch::initGearbox()
7327{
7328 GearboxUtils gearbox;
7329 Table* tmpGearboxTable = m_gearboxTable.get();
7330 m_gearboxEnabled = gearbox.isGearboxEnabled(tmpGearboxTable);
7331
7332 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
7333
7334 if (m_gearboxEnabled)
7335 {
7336 m_gearboxPhyMap = gearbox.loadPhyMap(tmpGearboxTable);
7337 m_gearboxInterfaceMap = gearbox.loadInterfaceMap(tmpGearboxTable);
7338 m_gearboxLaneMap = gearbox.loadLaneMap(tmpGearboxTable);
7339 m_gearboxPortMap = gearbox.loadPortMap(tmpGearboxTable);
7340
7341 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("BOX: m_gearboxPhyMap size = %d.", (int) m_gearboxPhyMap.size());
7342 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("BOX: m_gearboxInterfaceMap size = %d.", (int) m_gearboxInterfaceMap.size());
7343 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("BOX: m_gearboxLaneMap size = %d.", (int) m_gearboxLaneMap.size());
7344 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("BOX: m_gearboxPortMap size = %d.", (int) m_gearboxPortMap.size());
7345
7346 m_gb_counter_db = shared_ptr<DBConnector>(new DBConnector("GB_COUNTERS_DB", 0));
7347 m_gbcounterTable = unique_ptr<Table>(new Table(m_gb_counter_db.get(), COUNTERS_PORT_NAME_MAP));
7348 }
7349}
7350
7351/*
7352 * Create both the system-side and line-side gearbox ports for the associated
7353 * PHY and connect the ports.
7354 *
7355 */
7356bool PortsOrch::initGearboxPort(Port &port)
7357{
7358 vector<sai_attribute_t> attrs;
7359 vector<uint32_t> lanes;
7360 vector<uint32_t> vals;
7361 sai_attribute_t attr;
7362 sai_object_id_t systemPort;
7363 sai_object_id_t linePort;
7364 sai_object_id_t connector;
7365 sai_object_id_t phyOid;
7366 sai_status_t status;
7367 string phyOidStr;
7368 int phy_id;
7369
7370 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
7371
7372 if (m_gearboxEnabled)
7373 {
7374 if (m_gearboxInterfaceMap.find(port.m_index) != m_gearboxInterfaceMap.end())
7375 {
7376 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("BOX: port_id:0x%" PRIx64 " index:%d alias:%s", port.m_port_id, port.m_index, port.m_alias.c_str());
7377
7378 phy_id = m_gearboxInterfaceMap[port.m_index].phy_id;
7379 phyOidStr = m_gearboxPhyMap[phy_id].phy_oid;
7380
7381 if (phyOidStr.size() == 0)
7382 {
7383 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("BOX: Gearbox PHY phy_id:%d has an invalid phy_oid", phy_id);
7384 return false;
7385 }
7386
7387 sai_deserialize_object_id(phyOidStr, phyOid);
7388
7389 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("BOX: Gearbox port %s assigned phyOid 0x%" PRIx64, port.m_alias.c_str(), phyOid);
7390 port.m_switch_id = phyOid;
7391
7392 /* Create SYSTEM-SIDE port */
7393 attrs.clear();
7394
7395 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_ADMIN_STATE;
7396 attr.value.booldata = port.m_admin_state_up;
7397 attrs.push_back(attr);
7398
7399 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_HW_LANE_LIST;
7400 lanes.assign(m_gearboxInterfaceMap[port.m_index].system_lanes.begin(), m_gearboxInterfaceMap[port.m_index].system_lanes.end());
7401 attr.value.u32list.list = lanes.data();
7402 attr.value.u32list.count = static_cast<uint32_t>(lanes.size());
7403 attrs.push_back(attr);
7404
7405 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < attr.value.u32list.count; i++)
7406 {
7407 SWSS_LOG_DEBUG("BOX: list[%d] = %d", i, attr.value.u32list.list[i]);
7408 }
7409
7410 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_SPEED;
7411 attr.value.u32 = (uint32_t) m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].system_speed * (uint32_t) lanes.size();
7412 if (isSpeedSupported(port.m_alias, port.m_port_id, attr.value.u32))
7413 {
7414 attrs.push_back(attr);
7415 }
7416
7417 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_AUTO_NEG_MODE;
7418 attr.value.booldata = m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].system_auto_neg;
7419 attrs.push_back(attr);
7420
7421 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_FEC_MODE;
7422 attr.value.s32 = fec_mode_map[m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].system_fec];
7423 attrs.push_back(attr);
7424
7425 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_INTERNAL_LOOPBACK_MODE;
7426 attr.value.u32 = loopback_mode_map[m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].system_loopback];
7427 attrs.push_back(attr);
7428
7429 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_LINK_TRAINING_ENABLE;
7430 attr.value.booldata = m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].system_training;
7431 attrs.push_back(attr);
7432
7433 status = sai_port_api->create_port(&systemPort, phyOid, static_cast<uint32_t>(attrs.size()), attrs.data());
7434 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
7435 {
7436 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("BOX: Failed to create Gearbox system-side port for alias:%s port_id:0x%" PRIx64 " index:%d status:%d",
7437 port.m_alias.c_str(), port.m_port_id, port.m_index, status);
7438 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiCreateStatus(SAI_API_PORT, status);
7439 if (handle_status != task_success)
7440 {
7441 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
7442 }
7443 }
7444 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("BOX: Created Gearbox system-side port 0x%" PRIx64 " for alias:%s index:%d",
7445 systemPort, port.m_alias.c_str(), port.m_index);
7446 port.m_system_side_id = systemPort;
7447
7448 /* Create LINE-SIDE port */
7449 attrs.clear();
7450
7451 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_ADMIN_STATE;
7452 attr.value.booldata = port.m_admin_state_up;
7453 attrs.push_back(attr);
7454
7455 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_HW_LANE_LIST;
7456 lanes.assign(m_gearboxInterfaceMap[port.m_index].line_lanes.begin(), m_gearboxInterfaceMap[port.m_index].line_lanes.end());
7457 attr.value.u32list.list = lanes.data();
7458 attr.value.u32list.count = static_cast<uint32_t>(lanes.size());
7459 attrs.push_back(attr);
7460
7461 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < attr.value.u32list.count; i++)
7462 {
7463 SWSS_LOG_DEBUG("BOX: list[%d] = %d", i, attr.value.u32list.list[i]);
7464 }
7465
7466 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_SPEED;
7467 attr.value.u32 = (uint32_t) m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].line_speed * (uint32_t) lanes.size();
7468 if (isSpeedSupported(port.m_alias, port.m_port_id, attr.value.u32))
7469 {
7470 attrs.push_back(attr);
7471 }
7472
7473 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_AUTO_NEG_MODE;
7474 attr.value.booldata = m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].line_auto_neg;
7475 attrs.push_back(attr);
7476
7477 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_FEC_MODE;
7478 attr.value.s32 = fec_mode_map[m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].line_fec];
7479 attrs.push_back(attr);
7480
7481 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_MEDIA_TYPE;
7482 attr.value.u32 = media_type_map[m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].line_media_type];
7483 attrs.push_back(attr);
7484
7485 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_INTERNAL_LOOPBACK_MODE;
7486 attr.value.u32 = loopback_mode_map[m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].line_loopback];
7487 attrs.push_back(attr);
7488
7489 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_LINK_TRAINING_ENABLE;
7490 attr.value.booldata = m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].line_training;
7491 attrs.push_back(attr);
7492
7493 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_INTERFACE_TYPE;
7494 attr.value.u32 = interface_type_map[m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].line_intf_type];
7495 attrs.push_back(attr);
7496
7497 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_ADVERTISED_SPEED;
7498 vals.assign(m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].line_adver_speed.begin(), m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].line_adver_speed.end());
7499 attr.value.u32list.list = vals.data();
7500 attr.value.u32list.count = static_cast<uint32_t>(vals.size());
7501 attrs.push_back(attr);
7502
7503 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_ADVERTISED_FEC_MODE;
7504 vals.assign(m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].line_adver_fec.begin(), m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].line_adver_fec.end());
7505 attr.value.u32list.list = vals.data();
7506 attr.value.u32list.count = static_cast<uint32_t>(vals.size());
7507 attrs.push_back(attr);
7508
7509 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_ADVERTISED_AUTO_NEG_MODE;
7510 attr.value.booldata = m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].line_adver_auto_neg;
7511 attrs.push_back(attr);
7512
7513 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_ADVERTISED_ASYMMETRIC_PAUSE_MODE;
7514 attr.value.booldata = m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].line_adver_asym_pause;
7515 attrs.push_back(attr);
7516
7517 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_ADVERTISED_MEDIA_TYPE;
7518 attr.value.u32 = media_type_map[m_gearboxPortMap[port.m_index].line_adver_media_type];
7519 attrs.push_back(attr);
7520
7521 status = sai_port_api->create_port(&linePort, phyOid, static_cast<uint32_t>(attrs.size()), attrs.data());
7522 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
7523 {
7524 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("BOX: Failed to create Gearbox line-side port for alias:%s port_id:0x%" PRIx64 " index:%d status:%d",
7525 port.m_alias.c_str(), port.m_port_id, port.m_index, status);
7526 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiCreateStatus(SAI_API_PORT, status);
7527 if (handle_status != task_success)
7528 {
7529 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
7530 }
7531 }
7532 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("BOX: Created Gearbox line-side port 0x%" PRIx64 " for alias:%s index:%d",
7533 linePort, port.m_alias.c_str(), port.m_index);
7534
7535 /* Connect SYSTEM-SIDE to LINE-SIDE */
7536 attrs.clear();
7537
7538 attr.id = SAI_PORT_CONNECTOR_ATTR_SYSTEM_SIDE_PORT_ID;
7539 attr.value.oid = systemPort;
7540 attrs.push_back(attr);
7541 attr.id = SAI_PORT_CONNECTOR_ATTR_LINE_SIDE_PORT_ID;
7542 attr.value.oid = linePort;
7543 attrs.push_back(attr);
7544
7545 status = sai_port_api->create_port_connector(&connector, phyOid, static_cast<uint32_t>(attrs.size()), attrs.data());
7546 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
7547 {
7548 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("BOX: Failed to connect Gearbox system-side:0x%" PRIx64 " to line-side:0x%" PRIx64 "; status:%d", systemPort, linePort, status);
7549 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiCreateStatus(SAI_API_PORT, status);
7550 if (handle_status != task_success)
7551 {
7552 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
7553 }
7554 }
7555
7556 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("BOX: Connected Gearbox ports; system-side:0x%" PRIx64 " to line-side:0x%" PRIx64, systemPort, linePort);
7557 m_gearboxPortListLaneMap[port.m_port_id] = make_tuple(systemPort, linePort);
7558 port.m_line_side_id = linePort;
7559 saiOidToAlias[systemPort] = port.m_alias;
7560 saiOidToAlias[linePort] = port.m_alias;
7561
7562 /* Add gearbox system/line port name map to counter table */
7563 FieldValueTuple tuple(port.m_alias + "_system", sai_serialize_object_id(systemPort));
7564 vector<FieldValueTuple> fields;
7565 fields.push_back(tuple);
7566 m_gbcounterTable->set("", fields);
7567
7568 fields[0] = FieldValueTuple(port.m_alias + "_line", sai_serialize_object_id(linePort));
7569 m_gbcounterTable->set("", fields);
7570
7571 /* Set serdes tx taps on system and line side */
7572 map<sai_port_serdes_attr_t, vector<uint32_t>> serdes_attr;
7573 typedef pair<sai_port_serdes_attr_t, vector<uint32_t>> serdes_attr_pair;
7574 vector<uint32_t> attr_val;
7575 for (auto pair: tx_fir_strings_system_side) {
7576 if (m_gearboxInterfaceMap[port.m_index].tx_firs.find(pair.first) != m_gearboxInterfaceMap[port.m_index].tx_firs.end() ) {
7577 attr_val.clear();
7578 getPortSerdesVal(m_gearboxInterfaceMap[port.m_index].tx_firs[pair.first], attr_val, 10);
7579 serdes_attr.insert(serdes_attr_pair(pair.second, attr_val));
7580 }
7581 }
7582 if (serdes_attr.size() != 0)
7583 {
7584 if (setPortSerdesAttribute(systemPort, phyOid, serdes_attr))
7585 {
7586 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Set port %s system side preemphasis is success", port.m_alias.c_str());
7587 }
7588 else
7589 {
7590 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s system side pre-emphasis", port.m_alias.c_str());
7591 return false;
7592 }
7593 }
7594 serdes_attr.clear();
7595 for (auto pair: tx_fir_strings_line_side) {
7596 if (m_gearboxInterfaceMap[port.m_index].tx_firs.find(pair.first) != m_gearboxInterfaceMap[port.m_index].tx_firs.end() ) {
7597 attr_val.clear();
7598 getPortSerdesVal(m_gearboxInterfaceMap[port.m_index].tx_firs[pair.first], attr_val, 10);
7599 serdes_attr.insert(serdes_attr_pair(pair.second, attr_val));
7600 }
7601 }
7602 if (serdes_attr.size() != 0)
7603 {
7604 if (setPortSerdesAttribute(linePort, phyOid, serdes_attr))
7605 {
7606 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Set port %s line side preemphasis is success", port.m_alias.c_str());
7607 }
7608 else
7609 {
7610 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to set port %s line side pre-emphasis", port.m_alias.c_str());
7611 return false;
7612 }
7613 }
7614 }
7615 }
7616
7617 return true;
7618}
7619
7620const gearbox_phy_t* PortsOrch::getGearboxPhy(const Port &port)
7621{
7622 auto gearbox_interface = m_gearboxInterfaceMap.find(port.m_index);
7623 if (gearbox_interface == m_gearboxInterfaceMap.end())
7624 {
7625 return nullptr;
7626 }
7627
7628 auto phy = m_gearboxPhyMap.find(gearbox_interface->second.phy_id);
7629 if (phy == m_gearboxPhyMap.end())
7630 {
7631 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Gearbox Phy %d dones't exist", gearbox_interface->second.phy_id);
7632 return nullptr;
7633 }
7634
7635 return &phy->second;
7636}
7637
7638bool PortsOrch::getPortIPG(sai_object_id_t port_id, uint32_t &ipg)
7639{
7640 sai_attribute_t attr;
7641 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_IPG;
7642
7643 sai_status_t status = sai_port_api->get_port_attribute(port_id, 1, &attr);
7644
7645 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
7646 {
7647 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiGetStatus(SAI_API_PORT, status);
7648 if (handle_status != task_success)
7649 {
7650 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
7651 }
7652 }
7653
7654 ipg = attr.value.u32;
7655
7656 return true;
7657}
7658
7659bool PortsOrch::setPortIPG(sai_object_id_t port_id, uint32_t ipg)
7660{
7661 sai_attribute_t attr;
7662 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_IPG;
7663 attr.value.u32 = ipg;
7664
7665 sai_status_t status = sai_port_api->set_port_attribute(port_id, &attr);
7666
7667 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
7668 {
7669 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiSetStatus(SAI_API_PORT, status);
7670 if (handle_status != task_success)
7671 {
7672 return parseHandleSaiStatusFailure(handle_status);
7673 }
7674 }
7675
7676 return true;
7677}
7678
7679bool PortsOrch::getSystemPorts()
7680{
7681 sai_status_t status;
7682 sai_attribute_t attr;
7683 uint32_t i;
7684
7685 m_systemPortCount = 0;
7686
7687 attr.id = SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_NUMBER_OF_SYSTEM_PORTS;
7688
7689 status = sai_switch_api->get_switch_attribute(gSwitchId, 1, &attr);
7690 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
7691 {
7692 SWSS_LOG_INFO("Failed to get number of system ports, rv:%d", status);
7693 return false;
7694 }
7695
7696 m_systemPortCount = attr.value.u32;
7697 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Got %d system ports", m_systemPortCount);
7698
7699 if(m_systemPortCount)
7700 {
7701 /* Make <switch_id, core, core port> tuple and system port oid map */
7702
7703 vector<sai_object_id_t> system_port_list;
7704 system_port_list.resize(m_systemPortCount);
7705
7706 attr.id = SAI_SWITCH_ATTR_SYSTEM_PORT_LIST;
7707 attr.value.objlist.count = (uint32_t)system_port_list.size();
7708 attr.value.objlist.list = system_port_list.data();
7709
7710 status = sai_switch_api->get_switch_attribute(gSwitchId, 1, &attr);
7711 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
7712 {
7713 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get system port list, rv:%d", status);
7714 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiGetStatus(SAI_API_SWITCH, status);
7715 if (handle_status != task_process_status::task_success)
7716 {
7717 return false;
7718 }
7719 }
7720
7721 uint32_t spcnt = attr.value.objlist.count;
7722 for(i = 0; i < spcnt; i++)
7723 {
7724 attr.id = SAI_SYSTEM_PORT_ATTR_CONFIG_INFO;
7725
7726 status = sai_system_port_api->get_system_port_attribute(system_port_list[i], 1, &attr);
7727 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
7728 {
7729 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get system port config info spid:%" PRIx64, system_port_list[i]);
7730 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiGetStatus(SAI_API_SYSTEM_PORT, status);
7731 if (handle_status != task_process_status::task_success)
7732 {
7733 return false;
7734 }
7735 }
7736
7737 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("SystemPort(0x%" PRIx64 ") - port_id:%u, switch_id:%u, core:%u, core_port:%u, speed:%u, voqs:%u",
7738 system_port_list[i],
7739 attr.value.sysportconfig.port_id,
7740 attr.value.sysportconfig.attached_switch_id,
7741 attr.value.sysportconfig.attached_core_index,
7742 attr.value.sysportconfig.attached_core_port_index,
7743 attr.value.sysportconfig.speed,
7744 attr.value.sysportconfig.num_voq);
7745
7746 tuple<int, int, int> sp_key(attr.value.sysportconfig.attached_switch_id,
7747 attr.value.sysportconfig.attached_core_index,
7748 attr.value.sysportconfig.attached_core_port_index);
7749
7750 m_systemPortOidMap[sp_key] = system_port_list[i];
7751 }
7752 }
7753
7754 return true;
7755}
7756
7757bool PortsOrch::getRecircPort(Port &port, string role)
7758{
7759 for (auto it = m_recircPortRole.begin(); it != m_recircPortRole.end(); it++)
7760 {
7761 if (it->second == role)
7762 {
7763 return getPort(it->first, port);
7764 }
7765 }
7766 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to find recirc port with role %s", role.c_str());
7767 return false;
7768}
7769
7770bool PortsOrch::addSystemPorts()
7771{
7772 vector<string> keys;
7773 vector<FieldValueTuple> spFv;
7774
7775 DBConnector appDb(APPL_DB, DBConnector::DEFAULT_UNIXSOCKET, 0);
7776 Table appSystemPortTable(&appDb, APP_SYSTEM_PORT_TABLE_NAME);
7777
7778 //Retrieve system port configurations from APP DB
7779 appSystemPortTable.getKeys(keys);
7780 for ( auto &alias : keys )
7781 {
7782 appSystemPortTable.get(alias, spFv);
7783
7784 int32_t system_port_id = -1;
7785 int32_t switch_id = -1;
7786 int32_t core_index = -1;
7787 int32_t core_port_index = -1;
7788
7789 for ( auto &fv : spFv )
7790 {
7791 if(fv.first == "switch_id")
7792 {
7793 switch_id = stoi(fv.second);
7794 continue;
7795 }
7796 if(fv.first == "core_index")
7797 {
7798 core_index = stoi(fv.second);
7799 continue;
7800 }
7801 if(fv.first == "core_port_index")
7802 {
7803 core_port_index = stoi(fv.second);
7804 continue;
7805 }
7806 if(fv.first == "system_port_id")
7807 {
7808 system_port_id = stoi(fv.second);
7809 continue;
7810 }
7811 }
7812
7813 if(system_port_id < 0 || switch_id < 0 || core_index < 0 || core_port_index < 0)
7814 {
7815 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Invalid or Missing field values for %s! system_port id:%d, switch_id:%d, core_index:%d, core_port_index:%d",
7816 alias.c_str(), system_port_id, switch_id, core_index, core_port_index);
7817 continue;
7818 }
7819
7820 tuple<int, int, int> sp_key(switch_id, core_index, core_port_index);
7821
7822 if(m_systemPortOidMap.find(sp_key) != m_systemPortOidMap.end())
7823 {
7824
7825 sai_attribute_t attr;
7826 vector<sai_attribute_t> attrs;
7827 sai_object_id_t system_port_oid;
7828 sai_status_t status;
7829
7830 //Retrive system port config info and enable
7831 system_port_oid = m_systemPortOidMap[sp_key];
7832
7833 attr.id = SAI_SYSTEM_PORT_ATTR_TYPE;
7834 attrs.push_back(attr);
7835
7836 attr.id = SAI_SYSTEM_PORT_ATTR_CONFIG_INFO;
7837 attrs.push_back(attr);
7838
7839 status = sai_system_port_api->get_system_port_attribute(system_port_oid, static_cast<uint32_t>(attrs.size()), attrs.data());
7840 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
7841 {
7842 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get system port config info spid:%" PRIx64, system_port_oid);
7843 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiGetStatus(SAI_API_SYSTEM_PORT, status);
7844 if (handle_status != task_process_status::task_success)
7845 {
7846 continue;
7847 }
7848 }
7849
7850 //Create or update system port and add to the port list.
7851 Port port(alias, Port::SYSTEM);
7852 port.m_port_id = system_port_oid;
7853 port.m_admin_state_up = true;
7854 port.m_oper_status = SAI_PORT_OPER_STATUS_UP;
7855 port.m_speed = attrs[1].value.sysportconfig.speed;
7856 port.m_mtu = DEFAULT_SYSTEM_PORT_MTU;
7857 if (attrs[0].value.s32 == SAI_SYSTEM_PORT_TYPE_LOCAL)
7858 {
7859 //Get the local port oid
7860 attr.id = SAI_SYSTEM_PORT_ATTR_PORT;
7861
7862 status = sai_system_port_api->get_system_port_attribute(system_port_oid, 1, &attr);
7863 if (status != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
7864 {
7865 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get local port oid of local system port spid:%" PRIx64, system_port_oid);
7866 task_process_status handle_status = handleSaiGetStatus(SAI_API_SYSTEM_PORT, status);
7867 if (handle_status != task_process_status::task_success)
7868 {
7869 continue;
7870 }
7871 }
7872
7873 //System port for local port. Update the system port info in the existing physical port
7874 Port local_port;
7875 if(!getPort(attr.value.oid, local_port))
7876 {
7877 //This is system port for non-front panel local port (CPU or OLP or RCY (Inband)). Not an error
7878 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Add port for non-front panel local system port 0x%" PRIx64 "; core: %d, core port: %d",
7879 system_port_oid, core_index, core_port_index);
7880 }
7881 local_port.m_system_port_info.local_port_oid = attr.value.oid;
7882 }
7883
7884 port.m_system_port_oid = system_port_oid;
7885
7886 port.m_system_port_info.alias = alias;
7887 port.m_system_port_info.type = (sai_system_port_type_t) attrs[0].value.s32;
7888 port.m_system_port_info.port_id = attrs[1].value.sysportconfig.port_id;
7889 port.m_system_port_info.switch_id = attrs[1].value.sysportconfig.attached_switch_id;
7890 port.m_system_port_info.core_index = attrs[1].value.sysportconfig.attached_core_index;
7891 port.m_system_port_info.core_port_index = attrs[1].value.sysportconfig.attached_core_port_index;
7892 port.m_system_port_info.speed = attrs[1].value.sysportconfig.speed;
7893 port.m_system_port_info.num_voq = attrs[1].value.sysportconfig.num_voq;
7894
7895 initializeVoqs( port );
7896 setPort(port.m_alias, port);
7897 /* Add system port name map to counter table */
7898 FieldValueTuple tuple(port.m_system_port_info.alias,
7899 sai_serialize_object_id(system_port_oid));
7900 vector<FieldValueTuple> fields;
7901 fields.push_back(tuple);
7902 m_counterSysPortTable->set("", fields);
7903 if(m_port_ref_count.find(port.m_alias) == m_port_ref_count.end())
7904 {
7905 m_port_ref_count[port.m_alias] = 0;
7906 }
7907
7908 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Added system port %" PRIx64 " for %s", system_port_oid, alias.c_str());
7909 }
7910 else
7911 {
7912 //System port does not exist in the switch
7913 //This can not happen since all the system ports are supposed to be created during switch creation itself
7914
7915 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("System port %s does not exist in switch. Port not added!", alias.c_str());
7916 continue;
7917 }
7918 }
7919
7920 return true;
7921}
7922
7923bool PortsOrch::getInbandPort(Port &port)
7924{
7925 if (m_portList.find(m_inbandPortName) == m_portList.end())
7926 {
7927 return false;
7928 }
7929 else
7930 {
7931 port = m_portList[m_inbandPortName];
7932 return true;
7933 }
7934}
7935
7936bool PortsOrch::isInbandPort(const string &alias)
7937{
7938 return (m_inbandPortName == alias);
7939}
7940
7941bool PortsOrch::setVoqInbandIntf(string &alias, string &type)
7942{
7943 if(m_inbandPortName == alias)
7944 {
7945 //Inband interface already exists with this name
7946 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("Interface %s is already configured as inband!", alias.c_str());
7947 return true;
7948 }
7949
7950 //Make sure port and host if exists for the configured inband interface
7951 Port port;
7952 if (!getPort(alias, port))
7953 {
7954 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Port/Vlan configured for inband intf %s is not ready!", alias.c_str());
7955 return false;
7956 }
7957
7958 if(type == "port" && !port.m_hif_id)
7959 {
7960 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Host interface is not available for port %s", alias.c_str());
7961 return false;
7962 }
7963
7964 //Store the name of the local inband port
7965 m_inbandPortName = alias;
7966
7967 return true;
7968}
7969
7970void PortsOrch::voqSyncAddLag (Port &lag)
7971{
7972 int32_t switch_id = lag.m_system_lag_info.switch_id;
7973
7974 // Sync only local lag add to CHASSIS_APP_DB
7975
7976 if (switch_id != gVoqMySwitchId)
7977 {
7978 return;
7979 }
7980
7981 uint32_t spa_id = lag.m_system_lag_info.spa_id;
7982
7983 vector<FieldValueTuple> attrs;
7984
7985 FieldValueTuple li ("lag_id", to_string(spa_id));
7986 attrs.push_back(li);
7987
7988 FieldValueTuple si ("switch_id", to_string(switch_id));
7989 attrs.push_back(si);
7990
7991 string key = lag.m_system_lag_info.alias;
7992
7993 m_tableVoqSystemLagTable->set(key, attrs);
7994}
7995
7996void PortsOrch::voqSyncDelLag(Port &lag)
7997{
