7998 // Sync only local lag del to CHASSIS_APP_DB
7999 if (lag.m_system_lag_info.switch_id != gVoqMySwitchId)
8000 {
8001 return;
8002 }
8003
8004 string key = lag.m_system_lag_info.alias;
8005
8006 m_tableVoqSystemLagTable->del(key);
8007}
8008
8009void PortsOrch::voqSyncAddLagMember(Port &lag, Port &port)
8010{
8011 // Sync only local lag's member add to CHASSIS_APP_DB
8012 if (lag.m_system_lag_info.switch_id != gVoqMySwitchId)
8013 {
8014 return;
8015 }
8016
8017 vector<FieldValueTuple> attrs;
8018 FieldValueTuple nullFv ("NULL", "NULL");
8019 attrs.push_back(nullFv);
8020
8021 string key = lag.m_system_lag_info.alias + ":" + port.m_system_port_info.alias;
8022 m_tableVoqSystemLagMemberTable->set(key, attrs);
8023}
8024
8025void PortsOrch::voqSyncDelLagMember(Port &lag, Port &port)
8026{
8027 // Sync only local lag's member del to CHASSIS_APP_DB
8028 if (lag.m_system_lag_info.switch_id != gVoqMySwitchId)
8029 {
8030 return;
8031 }
8032
8033 string key = lag.m_system_lag_info.alias + ":" + port.m_system_port_info.alias;
8034 m_tableVoqSystemLagMemberTable->del(key);
8035}
8036
8037std::unordered_set<std::string> PortsOrch::generateCounterStats(const string& type, bool gearbox)
8038{
8039 std::unordered_set<std::string> counter_stats;
8040 if (type == PORT_STAT_COUNTER_FLEX_COUNTER_GROUP)
8041 {
8042 auto& stat_ids = gearbox ? gbport_stat_ids : port_stat_ids;
8043 for (const auto& it: stat_ids)
8044 {
8045 counter_stats.emplace(sai_serialize_port_stat(it));
8046 }
8047 }
8048 else if (type == PORT_BUFFER_DROP_STAT_FLEX_COUNTER_GROUP)
8049 {
8050 for (const auto& it: port_buffer_drop_stat_ids)
8051 {
8052 counter_stats.emplace(sai_serialize_port_stat(it));
8053 }
8054 }
8055 return counter_stats;
8056}
8057
8058void PortsOrch::updateGearboxPortOperStatus(const Port& port)
8059{
8060 if (!isGearboxEnabled())
8061 return;
8062
8063 SWSS_LOG_NOTICE("BOX: port %s, system_side_id:0x%" PRIx64 "line_side_id:0x%" PRIx64,
8064 port.m_alias.c_str(), port.m_system_side_id, port.m_line_side_id);
8065
8066 if (!port.m_system_side_id || !port.m_line_side_id)
8067 return;
8068
8069 sai_attribute_t attr;
8070 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_OPER_STATUS;
8071 sai_status_t ret = sai_port_api->get_port_attribute(port.m_system_side_id, 1, &attr);
8072 if (ret != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
8073 {
8074 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("BOX: Failed to get system_oper_status for %s", port.m_alias.c_str());
8075 }
8076 else
8077 {
8078 sai_port_oper_status_t oper = static_cast<sai_port_oper_status_t>(attr.value.u32);
8079 vector<FieldValueTuple> tuples;
8080 FieldValueTuple tuple("system_oper_status", oper_status_strings.at(oper));
8081 tuples.push_back(tuple);
8082 m_portTable->set(port.m_alias, tuples);
8083 }
8084
8085 attr.id = SAI_PORT_ATTR_OPER_STATUS;
8086 ret = sai_port_api->get_port_attribute(port.m_line_side_id, 1, &attr);
8087 if (ret != SAI_STATUS_SUCCESS)
8088 {
8089 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("BOX: Failed to get line_oper_status for %s", port.m_alias.c_str());
8090 }
8091 else
8092 {
8093 sai_port_oper_status_t oper = static_cast<sai_port_oper_status_t>(attr.value.u32);
8094 vector<FieldValueTuple> tuples;
8095 FieldValueTuple tuple("line_oper_status", oper_status_strings.at(oper));
8096 tuples.push_back(tuple);
8097 m_portTable->set(port.m_alias, tuples);
8098 }
8099}
8100
8101bool PortsOrch::decrFdbCount(const std::string& alias, int count)
8102{
8103 auto itr = m_portList.find(alias);
8104 if (itr == m_portList.end())
8105 {
8106 return false;
8107 }
8108 else
8109 {
8110 itr->second.m_fdb_count -= count;
8111 }
8112 return true;
8113}
8114
8115void PortsOrch::setMACsecEnabledState(sai_object_id_t port_id, bool enabled)
8116{
8117 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
8118
8119 Port p;
8120 if (!getPort(port_id, p))
8121 {
8122 SWSS_LOG_ERROR("Failed to get port object for port id 0x%" PRIx64, port_id);
8123 return;
8124 }
8125
8126 if (enabled)
8127 {
8128 m_macsecEnabledPorts.insert(port_id);
8129 }
8130 else
8131 {
8132 m_macsecEnabledPorts.erase(port_id);
8133 }
8134
8135 if (p.m_mtu)
8136 {
8137 setPortMtu(p, p.m_mtu);
8138 }
8139}
8140
8141bool PortsOrch::isMACsecPort(sai_object_id_t port_id) const
8142{
8143 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
8144
8145 return m_macsecEnabledPorts.find(port_id) != m_macsecEnabledPorts.end();
8146}
8147
8148vector<sai_object_id_t> PortsOrch::getPortVoQIds(Port& port)
8149{
8150 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
8151
8152 return m_port_voq_ids[port.m_alias];
8153}
8154
8155/* Refresh the per-port Auto-Negotiation operational states */
8156void PortsOrch::refreshPortStateAutoNeg(const Port &port)
8157{
8158 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
8159
8160 if (port.m_type != Port::Type::PHY)
8161 {
8162 return;
8163 }
8164
8165 string adv_speeds = "N/A";
8166
8167 if (port.m_admin_state_up)
8168 {
8169 if (!getPortAdvSpeeds(port, true, adv_speeds))
8170 {
8171 adv_speeds = "N/A";
8172 updatePortStatePoll(port, PORT_STATE_POLL_AN, false);
8173 }
8174 }
8175
8176 m_portStateTable.hset(port.m_alias, "rmt_adv_speeds", adv_speeds);
8177}
8178
8179/* Refresh the per-port Link-Training operational states */
8180void PortsOrch::refreshPortStateLinkTraining(const Port &port)
8181{
8182 SWSS_LOG_ENTER();
8183
8184 if (port.m_type != Port::Type::PHY)
8185 {
8186 return;
8187 }
8188
8189 string status = "off";
8190
8191 if (port.m_admin_state_up && port.m_link_training > 0 && port.m_cap_lt > 0)
8192 {
8193 sai_port_link_training_rx_status_t rx_status;
8194 sai_port_link_training_failure_status_t failure;
8195
8196 if (!getPortLinkTrainingRxStatus(port, rx_status))
8197 {
8198 status = "on"; // LT is enabled, while the rx status is unavailable
8199 }
8200 else if (rx_status == SAI_PORT_LINK_TRAINING_RX_STATUS_TRAINED)
8201 {
8202 status = link_training_rx_status_map.at(rx_status);
8203 }
8204 else
8205 {
8206 if (getPortLinkTrainingFailure(port, failure) &&
8207 failure != SAI_PORT_LINK_TRAINING_FAILURE_STATUS_NO_ERROR)
8208 {
8209 status = link_training_failure_map.at(failure);
8210 }
8211 else
8212 {
8213 status = link_training_rx_status_map.at(rx_status);
8214 }
8215 }
8216 }
8217
8218 m_portStateTable.hset(port.m_alias, "link_training_status", status);
8219}
8220
8221/* Activate/De-activate a specific port state poller task */
8222void PortsOrch::updatePortStatePoll(const Port &port, port_state_poll_t type, bool active)
8223{
8224 if (type == PORT_STATE_POLL_NONE)
8225 {
8226 return;
8227 }
8228 if (active)
8229 {
8230 m_port_state_poll[port.m_alias] |= type;
8231 m_port_state_poller->start();
8232 }
8233 else
8234 {
8235 m_port_state_poll[port.m_alias] &= ~type;
8236 }
8237}
8238
8239void PortsOrch::doTask(swss::SelectableTimer &timer)
8240{
8241 Port port;
8242
8243 for (auto it = m_port_state_poll.begin(); it != m_port_state_poll.end(); )
8244 {
8245 if ((it->second == PORT_STATE_POLL_NONE) || !getPort(it->first, port))
8246 {
8247 it = m_port_state_poll.erase(it);
8248 continue;
8249 }
8250 if (!port.m_admin_state_up)
8251 {
8252 ++it;
8253 continue;
8254 }
8255 if (it->second & PORT_STATE_POLL_AN)
8256 {
8257 refreshPortStateAutoNeg(port);
8258 }
8259 if (it->second & PORT_STATE_POLL_LT)
8260 {
8261 refreshPortStateLinkTraining(port);
8262 }
8263 ++it;
8264 }
8265 if (m_port_state_poll.size() == 0)
8266 {
8267 m_port_state_poller->stop();
8268 }
8269}
